117a2(nyi khri): tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / bsti stang du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de ni pha dang / ma dang / gnyen bshes dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / dge sbyong
117a3(nyi khri): dang | bram ze dag gis dgongs par bya ba yin/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
117a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa thams cad kyis kyang dben cing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/
117a5(nyi khri): bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pas kyang / dgongs shing yid du 'ong
117a6(nyi khri): bar bya ba yin/ spongs pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
117a7(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa
117b1(nyi khri): mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/
117b2(nyi khri): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par
117b3(nyi khri): 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
117b4(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
117b5(nyi khri): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par
117b6(nyi khri): 'gyur ba yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mi 'phrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba mi 'phrogs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa mi
117b7(nyi khri): 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzhan gyis phyir rgol ba ji snyed byung ba la yang chos dang mthun par lan gdab pa'i mthu yod pa yin te/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
118a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams
118a2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
118a3(nyi khri): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / bsti stang du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa des tshe 'di'i yon
118a4(nyi khri): tan dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te
118a5(nyi khri): 'chang ba der/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs
118a6(nyi khri): pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor
118a7(nyi khri): dang | tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang /
118b1(nyi khri): chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der dong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
118b2(nyi khri): 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang /
118b3(nyi khri): shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu de dag kyang der dong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag
118b4(nyi khri): bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/ /kau shi ka/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
118b5(nyi khri): tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang /
118b6(nyi khri): tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che
118b7(nyi khri): ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang /
119a1(nyi khri): mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
119a2(nyi khri): dang | nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po/ gzi brjid chen po/ gzi brjid che bar bya ba mang po de dag kyang der dong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
119a3(nyi khri): bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/ /kau shi ka /de la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag
119a4(nyi khri): gis kyang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i bar gyi lha bla na med pa yang dag
119a5(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi
119a6(nyi khri): lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid chen po shes rab kyi pha
119a7(nyi khri): rol phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lhags pa de dag la chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin par gyur cig ces
119b1(nyi khri): sems bskyed par bya ste/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / 'chang ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / mchod pa byas shing / phyag byas te/ gdud
119b2(nyi khri): pa byas nas phyir 'dong ngo / /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og
119b3(nyi khri): min gyi bar gyi lha dag dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha de dag kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba byed
119b4(nyi khri): de| kau shi ka / de la las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par/ glags lta ba rnams kyis glags ma rnyed do/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di'i yon tan de lta bu dag kyang yongs su
119b5(nyi khri): zin par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang / der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba dang /rigs
119b6(nyi khri): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba bya ba'i don du 'dong bar sems te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na
119b7(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems can thams
120a1(nyi khri): cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des
120a2(nyi khri): 'dir phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang /
120a3(nyi khri): gdud pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha dag 'dir
120a4(nyi khri): 'ongs so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang du bzhag par snang ba chen po
120a5(nyi khri): byung bar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mthong na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir ni lha mthu chen po/ mthu chen po/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che ba/ gzi brjid
120a6(nyi khri): che ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba
120a7(nyi khri): dang | bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir lhags so/ /zhes bya bar nges par khong du chud par bya'o/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos lha rdzas
120b1(nyi khri): kyi dri ma las 'das pa/ sngon chad de lta bu tshor ma myong ba tshor na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo das 'di ni lha mthu chen po/ mthu chen po/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che ba dang / gzi
120b2(nyi khri): brjid che ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya
120b3(nyi khri): ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lhags so zhes bya bar nges par khong du chud par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gtsang
120b4(nyi khri): sbra'i spyod pa dang ldan na/ de'i gtsang sbra'i spyod pa des lha de dag kyang nye bar 'ongs shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / rim
120b5(nyi khri): gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byas nas shin tu dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur ro/ /gnas de na lha mthu chung ngu ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag kyang lha mthu
120b6(nyi khri): chen po/ mthu chen po/ de dag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / zil mi bzod pa'i phyir gnas de nas gud du 'dong bar sems so/ /ji lta ji ltar lha mthu chen po/ mthu chen po/ rdzu 'phrul
120b7(nyi khri): che ba dang / dbang che ba de dag nye bar 'ong bar sems pa/ de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de yang mos ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de'i gnas kyi 'khor kun tu yang
121a1(nyi khri): gtsang sbra med pa'i spyod pa mi rgyu bar byas te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir de'i 'khor gyis
121a2(nyi khri): yang spos chu'i chag chag gis btab bo/ /me tog dang / spos kyis gtor ro/ /bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod bzhag go /dar gyi lda ldi dang / gos kyi bla re bre zhing sa'i phyogs de yang rnam pa du
121a3(nyi khri): mas brgyan par bya'o/ /kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la ngal zhing chad par 'gyur ba med de/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni lus bde ba dang / lus yang pa dang /
121a4(nyi khri): lus gsal ba yang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des ni sems bde ba dang / sems yang ba dang / sems gsal ba yang nyams su myong bar 'gyur
121a5(nyi khri): ro| |de nas nub mo nyal na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam pas mos par byas na/ sdig to'i rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /des mthong na'ang de bzhin gshegs
121a6(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kun tu brgyan ba/ sku gser gyi mdog tu bzhugs
121a7(nyi khri): pa| dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba/ chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di
121b1(nyi khri): lta ste| pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi chos bstan
121b2(nyi khri): pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
121b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
121b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang mthong bar 'gyur
121b5(nyi khri): ro| |de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po chos yang dag par bgro ba byed cing /
121b6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su bsgrub par bya'o/ /sems can mang po ni 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di ltar yongs su gzung bar bya'o//
121b7(nyi khri): bdud 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'di ltar pham par bya'o zhes zer ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas phye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /
122a1(nyi khri): lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
122a2(nyi khri): brgya stong mang po'i sgra'ang thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig
122a3(nyi khri): bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes
122a4(nyi khri): bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ steng gi phyogs kyi bar
122a5(nyi khri): kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang
122a6(nyi khri): po'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
122a7(nyi khri): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar
122b1(nyi khri): 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /de ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rmi lam bzang po de lta bu dag mthong bar 'gyur te/ de dag bde bar nyal zhing bde bar ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /
122b2(nyi khri): de'i lus kyang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lus la yang ba'i nyams yod par 'gyur zhing / lci ba'i nyams med par 'gyur/ zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur/ gos la chags
122b3(nyi khri): pa med par 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad la chags pa med par 'gyur/ zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ gos kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad
122b4(nyi khri): kyi 'du shes kyang chung bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /de ni 'di ltar/ dper na/ rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i dge slong ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i sems yid la bya bas yongs su brlan
122b5(nyi khri): pa ni/ zas la cher chags pa med pa yin/ zas kyi 'du shes chung ba yin/ kau shi ka /de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang zas la cher chags pa med par
122b6(nyi khri): 'gyur re/ /zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la mi ma yin pa rnams lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang
122b7(nyi khri): dang | byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji
123a1(nyi khri): snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang
123a2(nyi khri): ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ /kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'di nyid la yon tan 'di dag yongs su gzung bar 'dod pas/ /
123a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la nan tan du mnyan par bya'o/ /gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o//
123a4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral bar bya'o/ /kau shi ka /de ste rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma bzung /
123a5(nyi khri): ma bcangs/ ma bklags/ kun chub par ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas na'ang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing /
123a6(nyi khri): glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis
123a7(nyi khri): rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /bsti stang du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /kau shi ka /de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po
123b1(nyi khri): la bde ba'i don du zhugs pa yin/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun
123b2(nyi khri): chub par bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing bris te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba
123b3(nyi khri): dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ bsti stang du byed/ mchod par byed na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/
123b4(nyi khri): phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams la/ nam 'tsho'i
123b5(nyi khri): bar du na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
123b6(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ nam
123b7(nyi khri): 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/
124a1(nyi khri): bkur stir byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas pas ni ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa le'u nyi shu
124a2(nyi khri): gcig pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la stsal pa/ kau shi ka /khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
124a3(nyi khri): gdung gis byur bur gang ba zhig kyang rnyed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las byin na/ de las gang blang bar bya/ brgya byin gyis gsol
124a4(nyi khri): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang la las stsal/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
124a5(nyi khri): glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bdag gis blang bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin
124a6(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag rim gro ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ mi ston pa'ang ma lags/ btsun par mi bgyid pa'ang lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni
124a7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba'am/ bkur stir bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba'am/ bsti stang du bgyi bar mi 'tshal pa'am/ mchod bar bgyi bar
124b1(nyi khri): mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
124b2(nyi khri): gdung rnams kyang rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur stir bgyi ba lags/ bsti stang du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags so/ /sku gdung de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
124b3(nyi khri): bsgrubs pa ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nam bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng
124b4(nyi khri): pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid cing / bkur stir bgyid pa
124b5(nyi khri): dang | bsti stang du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa'i tshe'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba lags pas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha
124b6(nyi khri): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur stir bgyi ba lags/ bsti stang du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags pas bsrung zhing rim gror dang / bkur sti
124b7(nyi khri): dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
125a1(nyi khri): gzung du med pa/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa yin na/ de la khyod ji ltar
125a2(nyi khri): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du med pa/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa la gzung bar sems/
125a3(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ 'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/ bskyed
125a4(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ma yin/ bskyur ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'bri ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/ sangs
125a5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / nyan
125a6(nyi khri): thos kyi chos rnams dang / slob ba dang / mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar bsgrub
125a7(nyi khri): pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du nye bar bsgrub pa ma
125b1(nyi khri): yin| nang stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma
125b2(nyi khri): yin| yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar bsgrub
125b3(nyi khri): pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas
125b4(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi
125b5(nyi khri): sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
125b6(nyi khri): pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin no/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de
125b7(nyi khri): de bzhin te/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang gis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor
126a1(nyi khri): bar byed pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya bar shes pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
126a2(nyi khri): spyod pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
126a3(nyi khri): ni mi gnyis pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
126a4(nyi khri): gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ kau shi ka /legs so/ /legs
126a5(nyi khri): so| |de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis
126a6(nyi khri): pa'o| |bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
126a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o/ /kau shi ka /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod
126b1(nyi khri): pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau
126b2(nyi khri): shi ka / gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
126b3(nyi khri): phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su
126b4(nyi khri): med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
126b5(nyi khri): dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / shes rab
126b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
126b7(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
127a1(nyi khri): dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
127a2(nyi khri): dang | sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
127a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/ de la bslabs pas ni/ byang chub sems
127a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par
127a5(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi/ lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/
127a6(nyi khri): der lha'i bu gang ji snyed bdag gi rim gro la mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyid de/ nam der bdag ma mchis shing / stan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe'ang lha'i bu
127a7(nyi khri): de dag 'khor der mchis shing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis
127b1(nyi khri): shing phyag btsal te slar mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha ton du bgyid cing gzhan la yang
127b2(nyi khri): rgya cher ston pa der/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye
127b3(nyi khri): chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo / /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
127b4(nyi khri): thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo zhes/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bgyis shing gdung pa
127b5(nyi khri): bgyis nas/ slar mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pa'i slad du/ mchod
127b6(nyi khri): pa mnga' ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams
127b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to/ /rgyur gyur to/ /rkyen du gyur to/ /yongs su sgrub par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bas na cha de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi
128a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/ chos
128a2(nyi khri): kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe 'jigs pa'am/ bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ de
128a3(nyi khri): ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
128a4(nyi khri): pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
128a5(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa de
128a6(nyi khri): dag ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/
128a7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma ma mchis
128b1(nyi khri): pa ma lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ chos thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma
128b2(nyi khri): mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa
128b3(nyi khri): dang | rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi ston te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma
128b4(nyi khri): mchis/ brjod du ma mchis/ smos su ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa
128b5(nyi khri): dang | smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /
128b6(nyi khri): rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
128b7(nyi khri): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
129a1(nyi khri): kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o/ /bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
129a2(nyi khri): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
129a3(nyi khri): gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / de bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang /
129a4(nyi khri): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa bgyid
129a5(nyi khri): pa de ni nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du des sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /byol
129a6(nyi khri): song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /de ni de bzhin
129a7(nyi khri): gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
129b1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan
129b2(nyi khri): sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyid cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang
129b3(nyi khri): gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang stsal la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang
129b4(nyi khri): bris te stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung
129b5(nyi khri): ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur stir
129b6(nyi khri): bgyi ba dang / bsti stang du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ de dag la rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ bsti stang du bgyis/
129b7(nyi khri): mchod par bgyis na/ log par ltung ba dang / ngan song du mchi ngar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong nas/ smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa'am
130a1(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
130a2(nyi khri): 'das| de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
130a3(nyi khri): 'das| de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs
130a4(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / chos gtan la
130a5(nyi khri): dbab pa bstan pa'i bar du gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan
130a6(nyi khri): la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
130a7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo/ /'di las byung ba ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / chos gtan la dbab
130b1(nyi khri): pa bstan pa'i bar dag go / bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang po dang /
130b2(nyi khri): lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
130b3(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / chos gtan
130b4(nyi khri): la dbab pa bstan pa'i bar du gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/
130b5(nyi khri): gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
130b6(nyi khri): rgyas rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo/ /'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i
130b7(nyi khri): bar dag go / bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
131a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas de dag la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba
131a2(nyi khri): dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing /
131a3(nyi khri): me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur
131a4(nyi khri): sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa bgyis par yang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
131a5(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun
131a6(nyi khri): chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa des ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /byol song gi skye
131a7(nyi khri): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du
131b1(nyi khri): zhe na| 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
131b2(nyi khri): bris shing 'dzin to/ /'chang ngo / /klog go /kun chub par bgyid do/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do/ /bris pa de la yang me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye
131b3(nyi khri): ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ bsti stang du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid do//
131b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o/ /nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang
131b5(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de la me tog dang / phreng
131b6(nyi khri): ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti
131b7(nyi khri): stang dang / mchod par bgyis pa des ni/ gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu nor gyi
132a1(nyi khri): bdag po zhig 'jigs nas/ rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la brten nas/ de rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la brten pas/ sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid
132a2(nyi khri): kyang de la brten pas/ de dag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar gsha' ste/ gang rgyal po la brten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la
132a3(nyi khri): brten pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan
132a4(nyi khri): 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de'ang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs par blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bas na bdag
132a5(nyi khri): gis cha de gnyis las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
132a6(nyi khri): rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
132a7(nyi khri): rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do/ /'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di las byung ba ni pha rol
132b1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa lnga ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/ /'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar te/ bcom ldan 'das/ grong ngam/ grong brdal lam/
132b2(nyi khri): grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid
132b3(nyi khri): pa dang / de bris shing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag tu mi'am/ mi ma lags pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur
132b4(nyi khri): te| sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bas na/
132b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don du nye bar gnas
132b6(nyi khri): so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o/ /bcom
132b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po mi dpogs rin chen zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de ni nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin
133a1(nyi khri): po che de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der/ mi ma lags pa rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /mi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa'am/ bud med kyang nor bu rin po che
133a2(nyi khri): de bstan na/ mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod de myur du 'pho zhing mi gnas so/ /mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ mkhris
133a3(nyi khri): pa de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung gis mnar ba'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ rlung de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen
133a4(nyi khri): po de btags na/ bad kan de'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ 'dus pa'i nad de'ang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par mi
133a5(nyi khri): 'phel lo/ /nub mo ni nor bu rin po che chen po de snang bar bgyid do/ /tsha ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do/ /grang ba'i dus
133a6(nyi khri): na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de dro bar bgyid do/ /nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de yang / ha cang yang mi dro/ ha
133a7(nyi khri): cang yang mi grang zhing ran pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/ /nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i dog sa'i phyogs der sbrul lam/ de ma lags pa'i sdig pa la
133b1(nyi khri): sogs pa gdug pa dang / gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po sum cu bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes pa'am/
133b2(nyi khri): bud med la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin pa la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na/ des de mthong ma thag tu dug de yang byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nor bu rin po che chen po de ni
133b3(nyi khri): yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ skyes pa'am bud med la la zhig 'brum bus btab bam/ mig rab rib can du gyur te/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/
133b4(nyi khri): lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad ci byung ba las de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na de dag gi 'brum bu'am/ rab rib bam/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/
133b5(nyi khri): sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang
133b6(nyi khri): ldan te/ gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de dag chab rnyog pa can gyi nang du stsal na/ de'i mod la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/ /gal
133b7(nyi khri): te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos sngon pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser po'am/ dmar po'am/
134a1(nyi khri): dkar po'am/ le brgan nam/ shel gyi kha dog gam/ gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab
134a2(nyi khri): de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ /chab de la rnyog pa mchis pa'ang / nor bu rin po che chen po des dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu
134a3(nyi khri): dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi
134a4(nyi khri): 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ nor
134a5(nyi khri): bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam/ 'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la'ang yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa dga' bo/ nor bu rin po che
134a6(nyi khri): chen po de ni lha rdzas te/ btsun pa dga' bo/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che gang yod pa de dag ni chung zhing lci/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni che zhing yang ste/ 'dzam
134a7(nyi khri): bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag ni lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che de dag gis ni/ lha rdzas
134b1(nyi khri): kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de'i grangs sam/ cha'am/ bgrang ba'am/ dpe'am/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
134b2(nyi khri): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la zhig gi nang du stsal stsal ba las/ snod de nas byung yang snod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yid du mchi bar
134b3(nyi khri): 'gyur te/ gzhan yang snod de la mos pa skyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gi lus sam
134b4(nyi khri): sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / gnod pa mi las gyur pa'am/ mi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ nor bu rin po che chen po zhes
134b5(nyi khri): bgyi ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan
134b6(nyi khri): lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ /
134b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha
135a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
135a2(nyi khri): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
135a3(nyi khri): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
135a4(nyi khri): dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
135a5(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid
135a6(nyi khri): dang | lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
135a7(nyi khri): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / bag chags kyi
135b1(nyi khri): mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa dang / mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi nyams pa'i chos
135b2(nyi khri): nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom
135b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i snod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis
135b4(nyi khri): pa| rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye/ mi 'gag pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa blang ba ma mchis/ dor ba ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dbri ba ma mchis/ bsnan
135b5(nyi khri): pa mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba ma mchis/ 'gro ba ma mchis/ gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom
135b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyi snod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyis yongs su
135b7(nyi khri): bsgoms pa'o/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ /gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
136a1(nyi khri): rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur yongs su gtams pa lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
136a2(nyi khri): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/ bcom
136a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
136a4(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te mchod pa mnga'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pas na/
136a5(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror
136a6(nyi khri): bgyid pa dang / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / bsti stang du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' mi dmigs shing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ bram ze'i
136a7(nyi khri): rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum mam/ mtshe ma'am/ dga' ldan nam/ 'phrul dga'
136b1(nyi khri): 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang / lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
136b2(nyi khri): mchod pa'i 'bras bu lta de tsam du bas kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / bklags shing kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na/ sbyin
136b3(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
136b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su
136b5(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de
136b6(nyi khri): ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs che zhing
136b7(nyi khri): mtho ba'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'i lus sam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal bso po'i gzugs
137a1(nyi khri): kyang rung ste/ de lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub
137a2(nyi khri): sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
137a3(nyi khri): sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
137a4(nyi khri): sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ glo ba ma ches pa yang ma mchis/ mchod par mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags/ gzung bar mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags te/ bcom
137a5(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa bgyis na/ sangs rgyas
137a6(nyi khri): kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la'ang rim gro
137a7(nyi khri): dang | bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ de
137b1(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes
137b2(nyi khri): kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing mchod par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/
137b3(nyi khri): gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang /
137b4(nyi khri): tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha
137b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des/ chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
137b6(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par
137b7(nyi khri): bgyi| mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid
138a1(nyi khri): de| gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la 'dus
138a2(nyi khri): byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
138a3(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ye shes dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi
138a4(nyi khri): dang | gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
138a5(nyi khri): dang | mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa
138a6(nyi khri): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa med pa dang / zag pa
138a7(nyi khri): dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces
138b1(nyi khri): bgyi'o/ /de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las
138b2(nyi khri): gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ni chos thams
138b3(nyi khri): cad kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ /
138b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed
138b5(nyi khri): cig byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus
138b6(nyi khri): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing / bla na med pa yang
138b7(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
139a1(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
139a2(nyi khri): pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
139a3(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
139a4(nyi khri): kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod
139a5(nyi khri): pa de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
139a6(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig
139a7(nyi khri): 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa dag na/ rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha
139b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rang byang chub thob bo/ /'thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams
139b2(nyi khri): cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
139b3(nyi khri): med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang / zhen pa med pa dang / 'dor ba med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa dang / bsnan pa med pa'i
139b4(nyi khri): tshul dang / blang ba med pa dang / spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/ de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi
139b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thang ma yin/ thang du 'dug pa ma yin/
139b6(nyi khri): gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ 'dus
139b7(nyi khri): byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
140a1(nyi khri): pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i bar gyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma
140a2(nyi khri): yin| so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no/ /brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/ bcom
140a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yang 'tshal te/
140a4(nyi khri): sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sems can du gdags par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes
140a5(nyi khri): bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzugs su dmigs pa
140a6(nyi khri): ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis/ yid kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis
140a7(nyi khri): so| |gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis/ chos kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs
140b1(nyi khri): pa ma mchis so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba tshor bar dmigs
140b2(nyi khri): pa ma mchis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung
140b3(nyi khri): gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs
140b4(nyi khri): dang | skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shir dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis/
140b5(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
140b6(nyi khri): dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su dmigs
140b7(nyi khri): pa ma mchis/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma
141a1(nyi khri): mchis so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
141a2(nyi khri): su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon
141a3(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
141a4(nyi khri): stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs
141a5(nyi khri): pa ma mchis so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs
141a6(nyi khri): pa ma mchis so/ /rang byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/
141a7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmigs par
141b1(nyi khri): bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
141b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po des mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyad pas/ des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
141b3(nyi khri): lta'ang ci smos/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi/ de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
141b4(nyi khri): gzhan la mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun la'ang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
141b5(nyi khri): spyod de/ des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims
141b6(nyi khri): ngan pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'ang mi dmigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan
141b7(nyi khri): pa'ang mi dmigs/ le lo'ang mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/ 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyang mi dmigs/
142a1(nyi khri): shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ shes rab 'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mi dmigs pa'i
142a2(nyi khri): tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi
142a3(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i
142a4(nyi khri): tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i
142a5(nyi khri): tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /
142a6(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
142a7(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
142b1(nyi khri): ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes
142b2(nyi khri): pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba
142b3(nyi khri): dang | sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
142b4(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa
142b5(nyi khri): nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags
142b6(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
142b7(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi
143a1(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
143a2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra
143a3(nyi khri): bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
143a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
143a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
143a6(nyi khri): ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
143a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
143b1(nyi khri): pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha
143b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /kau shi ka /'di lta ste/
143b3(nyi khri): dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna tshogs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang / de dag gi
143b4(nyi khri): grib ma la khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
143b5(nyi khri): pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la'ang khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs so/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab
143b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan tshad
143b7(nyi khri): ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon
144a1(nyi khri): tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
144a2(nyi khri): bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te bcangs pa dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
144a3(nyi khri): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ bsti stang du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
144a4(nyi khri): pa tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te/ gzhan la stsal na/ de gnyis las
144a5(nyi khri): gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas na khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig /kau shi
144a6(nyi khri): ka |de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
144a7(nyi khri): bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / rigs kyi
144b1(nyi khri): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te bgo bshar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ de bzhin
144b2(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
144b3(nyi khri): dang | sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol
144b4(nyi khri): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog
144b5(nyi khri): dang | phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/
144b6(nyi khri): bsti stang du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa bas/ gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
144b7(nyi khri): lo| |bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas
145a1(nyi khri): rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/ sems can gyi ris na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs
145a2(nyi khri): rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la las chung ngu na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la/
145a3(nyi khri): mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
145a4(nyi khri): stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba
145a5(nyi khri): dang | spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bsti stang
145a6(nyi khri): du byas/ mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te chos kyi dga' bas gzhan la byin na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams
145a7(nyi khri): cher 'phel lo/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du/ gzhan gyi drung du song ste bshad cing
145b1(nyi khri): bstan pa dang / brjod cing bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag pas bsod nams cher
145b2(nyi khri): 'phel te/ de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo/ /bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
145b3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa/ ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi
145b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
145b5(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon
145b6(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med de/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
145b7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par
146a1(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
