206b6(nyi khri): r ang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba de ni dam par
206b7(nyi khri): 'gyur te/ rjes su yi rang ba de dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ rjes su yi rang ba 'di la ni de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan thams cad kyis brgya'i
207a1(nyi khri): char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod de/ rjes su yi rang ba 'di ni de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan dag pas rab ces bya'o/ /gtso
207a2(nyi khri): bo zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /mchog ces bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na med pa zhes bya'o/ /mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /mi
207a3(nyi khri): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
207a4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i
207a5(nyi khri): chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
207a6(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar dang / sems can thams cad
207a7(nyi khri): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod na/ 'di ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni gzugs so/ /rnam par grol
207b1(nyi khri): ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams so/ /rnam par
207b2(nyi khri): grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol
207b3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba
207b4(nyi khri): ji lta ba de lta bu ni nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji
207b5(nyi khri): lta ba de lta bu ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba
207b6(nyi khri): de lta bu ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
207b7(nyi khri): so| |rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
208a1(nyi khri): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rnam par grol
208a2(nyi khri): ba'i ye shes mthong ba'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni mos pa'o/ /rnam par grol
208a3(nyi khri): ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams so/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni
208a4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag go / rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta
208a5(nyi khri): bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos rnams dang / nyan thos de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rang sangs rgyas
208a6(nyi khri): rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba
208a7(nyi khri): ji lta ba de lta bu ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi chos nyid do/ /rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid do zhes de ltar chos ma chags pa dang / ma bcings
208b1(nyi khri): pa dang / ma grol ba dang / ma zhen pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos ma skyes pa dang / yongs su ma skyes pa dang / ma byung
208b2(nyi khri): ba dang / ma 'gags pa'i chos nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'pho ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa nye bar bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ rab
208b3(nyi khri): 'byor| 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rjes su yi rang ba'i rab bo/ /rjes su yi rang ba'i mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar ro/ /rab 'byor/ rjes su yi rang
208b4(nyi khri): pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang
208b5(nyi khri): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong
208b6(nyi khri): zhing chos ston pa dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
208b7(nyi khri): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs
209a1(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am
209a2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ nam 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
209a3(nyi khri): rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / de dag gi ring bsrel la nyin
209a4(nyi khri): mtshan du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang /
209a5(nyi khri): bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i don du nyams su len cing / de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa bsgom pa dang / de
209a6(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab bsgom pa bas /rigs
209a7(nyi khri): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang / tshul khrims
209b1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs
209b2(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge
209b3(nyi khri): ba mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la ni/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod de/ yongs su bsngo ba de nyid rab ces bya'o/ /
209b4(nyi khri): gong na med pa'i bar zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul
209b5(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209b6(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga
209b7(nyi khri): pa las/ yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// //de nas che dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
210a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang bar bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyag
210a2(nyi khri): bgyi bar 'os pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams gsum pa thams
210a3(nyi khri): cad kyis ma gos pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i mun pa thams cad bsal ba la rab rib ma mchis par bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan
210a4(nyi khri): 'das| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jigs pa dang /
210a5(nyi khri): gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu byang ba'i slad du bde bar bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can thams cad kyi mig lnga yongs su thob
210a6(nyi khri): par bgyid pa la snang bar bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can shul gol bar zhugs pa rnams mtha' las zlog pa'i slad du shul ston
210a7(nyi khri): pa'o| |bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bgyid pa'o/ /bcom
210b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos bskyed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
210b2(nyi khri): phyin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i slad du 'khor ba'i gnyen po'o/ /bcom
210b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos rin po che thams cad stobs pa'i slad du/ sems can mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab
210b4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du stobs bcu bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ rnam pa bcu
210b5(nyi khri): gnyis rgyud gsum du 'khor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du chos thams
210b6(nyi khri): cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am/ nyan thos sam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
210b7(nyi khri): pa pas/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ston pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
211a1(nyi khri): la gnas par bya'o/ /ston pa la ji ltar phyag bya ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
211a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha
211a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa'o/ /de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ngo / /byang
211a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'byung
211a5(nyi khri): ngo| |de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'byung ngo / /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
211a6(nyi khri): 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
211a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
211b1(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med
211b2(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
211b3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
211b4(nyi khri): bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ngo / /de nas lha'i
211b5(nyi khri): dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ zhu ba 'di ni gang las skyes/ ci'i rgyu snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces
211b6(nyi khri): smras so/ /kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba rnams ni thabs mkhas pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
211b7(nyi khri): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
212a1(nyi khri): dang bcas pa de dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
212a2(nyi khri): su bsngo ba nas bdag gi zhu ba skyes so/ /kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zil
212a3(nyi khri): gyis gnon to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis
212a4(nyi khri): gnon to/ /kau shi ka /'di lta ste/ dper na/ dmus long brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ brgya phrag stong yang rung ste/ dmigs bu med par lam du 'jug par yang mi nus na/ grong khyer du
212a5(nyi khri): 'gro bar lta ga la nus/ kau shi ka /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni dmus long lta bur gyur pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med na/ de dag la dmigs bu med
212a6(nyi khri): pas byang chub kyi lam yang bskyed mi nus na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du 'jug par lta ga la nus/ kau shi ka /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu
212a7(nyi khri): phyin pas yongs su zin par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mig dang ldan par 'gyur te/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i
212b1(nyi khri): ming 'thob bo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus gang 'di skad du/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po
212b2(nyi khri): 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo zhes smras na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni der yang ma zad de/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni
212b3(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/ /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
212b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/ /smras pa/ de lta ma yin te/ kau shi ka /de ni de lta ma yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
212b5(nyi khri): yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob par mi 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
212b6(nyi khri): phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming
212b7(nyi khri): 'thob ste/ kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshul
213a1(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
213a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /kau shi ka /de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi rab ces bya'o/ /gtso bo dang /
213a3(nyi khri): dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
213a4(nyi khri): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs mngon par
213a5(nyi khri): bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/
213a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
213a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /tshul khrims dang /
213b1(nyi khri): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid mngon
213b2(nyi khri): par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
213b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par
213b4(nyi khri): bya'o| |'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
213b5(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
213b6(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
213b7(nyi khri): dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam
214a1(nyi khri): pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par
214a2(nyi khri): bya'o| |de bzhin du chos thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar
214a3(nyi khri): gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar chos thams cad kyi bar du mngon par bsgrub pa ma mchis
214a4(nyi khri): pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gzugs skye
214a5(nyi khri): ba med pa dang / gzugs 'gag pa med pa dang / gzugs dmigs pa med pa dang / gzugs 'jig pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par
214a6(nyi khri): bya'o| |chos thams cad kyi bar du mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pas shes rab kyi pha
214a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos gang thob par bgyid/ bcom
214b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang thob par mi byed do/ /nam chos gang yang thob par
214b2(nyi khri): mi byed pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad thob par mi bgyid pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
214b3(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do/ /dge ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag
214b4(nyi khri): pa med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams thob par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
214b5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa ni chos gang gi phyir yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar mi gnas te/ de'i phyir chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan
214b6(nyi khri): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid dam/ bcom ldan 'das
214b7(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /gang de skad du ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid dam zhes zer ba ni/ kau shi ka/ de de
215a1(nyi khri): bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi byed/ dmigs par mi byed do/ /brgya byin
215a2(nyi khri): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid/ dmigs par mi bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan
215a3(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ ming ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma ji lta ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thob par mi byed pa yin
215a4(nyi khri): no| |brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na ji ltar thob par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa dang / mi len pa dang / mi gnas
215a5(nyi khri): pa dang / mi 'dor ba dang / mngon par chags pa med pa de ltar thob par byed de/ gang yang thob par byed pa med do/ /kau shi ka /de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams
215a6(nyi khri): cad thob par mi byed de/ gang yang thob par mi byed do/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa
215a7(nyi khri): dang | 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /de
215b1(nyi khri): nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
215b2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad thob par bgyid pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad thob par mi bgyid pa'o zhes
215b3(nyi khri): de lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
215b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs gang gis byang
215b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor bar byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du byed pa de lta bu'i rnam grangs yod do/ /gal te byang
215b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gsob bo/ /kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
215b7(nyi khri): 'di ni gsog go / kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying po med pa'o snyam du de ltar 'du shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
216a1(nyi khri): 'dor bar byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du byed pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ni rnam grangs gang
216a2(nyi khri): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dor bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
216a3(nyi khri): ring du byed pa'i rnam grangs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas chos gang la yid ches par mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
216a4(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/ gzugs la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
216a5(nyi khri): par shes pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs la
216a6(nyi khri): yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i rnam
216a7(nyi khri): par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig gi
216b1(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te
216b2(nyi khri): reg pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus
216b3(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la
216b4(nyi khri): yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /sa'i khams la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i
216b5(nyi khri): khams la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang /
216b6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
216b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par
217a1(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po
217a2(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
217a3(nyi khri): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
217a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
217a5(nyi khri): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yid ches
217a6(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la
217a7(nyi khri): yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
217b1(nyi khri): yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/ gzugs la yid ches par mi 'gyur ba lags/ rnam pa thams
217b2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yid ches par mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid
217b3(nyi khri): ches par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches par 'gyur te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid
217b4(nyi khri): ches pas/ gzugs la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
217b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rgyu gang gis na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di pha rol
217b6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa chen mo yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
217b7(nyi khri): par shes pa che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa che bar
218a1(nyi khri): mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
218a2(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ nang stong pa nyid che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi
218a3(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar
218a4(nyi khri): mi bgyid/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
218a5(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ ting
218a6(nyi khri): nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
218a7(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
218b1(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs
218b2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos rnams che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs 'du bar mi bgyid/ yangs par mi bgyid/ tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang /
218b3(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'du bar mi bgyid/ yangs par mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du 'du bar mi bgyid/ yangs par mi bgyid/ gzhan
218b4(nyi khri): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs tshad mchis par mi bgyid/ tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du tshad
218b5(nyi khri): mchis par mi bgyid/ tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs rgya chen por mi bgyid/ rgya chung ngur mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas
218b6(nyi khri): dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rgya chen por mi bgyid/ rgya chung ngur mi bgyid/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid/ mthu ma
218b7(nyi khri): mchis par mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid/ mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das /
219a1(nyi khri): rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o/ /
219a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
219a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ shes
219a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs che bar mi byed/ chung bar mi byed do/ /byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du che bar mi byed/ chung bar mi byed do/ /
219a5(nyi khri): gzugs mthu dang ldan pa'i bar du mi byed/ mthu med par mi byed do/ /byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mthu dang ldan par mi byed/ mthu med par
219a6(nyi khri): mi byed do zhes bgyi bar 'du shes su gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'du shes su gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
219a7(nyi khri): ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang gzugs che bar bgyid pa'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/ /byang chub
219b1(nyi khri): dang | sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du che bar bgyid pa'am/ chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/ /gang
219b2(nyi khri): gzugs mthu dang ldan pa'i bar du bgyid pa'am/ mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so/ /gang byang chub dang / sangs rgyas
219b3(nyi khri): dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mthu dang ldan pa'am/ mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/
219b4(nyi khri): gang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs che bar bgyid pa'am/ chung bar bgyid pa'am/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar
219b5(nyi khri): du che bar bgyid pa'am/ chung bar bgyid pa'am/ gang gzugs mthu dang ldan pa'i bar du bgyid pa'am/ mthu ma mchis par bgyid pa'am/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
219b6(nyi khri): kyi bar du mthu dang ldan pa'i bar du bgyid pa'am/ mthu ma mchis pa'i bar du bgyid pa de ni de'i dmigs pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la
219b7(nyi khri): byang chub ces bgyi ba ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar sems can skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/ /gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i
220a1(nyi khri): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa dang /
220a2(nyi khri): byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par blta'o/ /sems can rang bzhin
220a3(nyi khri): ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/ /gzugs rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin
220a4(nyi khri): ma mchis par blta'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rang bzhin ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
220a5(nyi khri): kyi bar du rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma mchis par blta'o/ /sems can dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
220a6(nyi khri): phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o/ /gzugs dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
220a7(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
220b1(nyi khri): phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par blta'o/ /sems can stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha
220b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
220b3(nyi khri): bar du stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta'o/ /sems can dben pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o/ /gzugs dben
220b4(nyi khri): pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs
220b5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du dben pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par blta'o/ /sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis par
220b6(nyi khri): blta'o/ /gzugs ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis par blta'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang / byang
220b7(nyi khri): chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis par blta'o/ /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab
221a1(nyi khri): pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par blta'o/ /gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
221a2(nyi khri): phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par blta'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas
221a3(nyi khri): kyi chos rnams kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par blta'o/ /sems can rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes
221a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis par blta'o/ /gzugs rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis
221a5(nyi khri): par blta'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
221a6(nyi khri): bar du rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa ma mchis par blta'o/ /sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma
221a7(nyi khri): mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis par blta'o/ /gzugs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa'i slad
221b1(nyi khri): du| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis par blta'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
221b2(nyi khri): ba ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
221b3(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis par blta'o/ /sems can gyi stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis par
221b4(nyi khri): blta'o/ /gzugs kyi stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis par blta'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
221b5(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis
221b6(nyi khri): pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis par blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des kyang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
221b7(nyi khri): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u nyi shu lnga pa'o// //de
222a1(nyi khri): nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
222a2(nyi khri): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de/ gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir mchis pa lags/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ji srid cig nas bla na med
222a3(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba lags/ gang shes
222a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la don dang tshul gyis mos par 'gyur ba de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni yun ring po ji srid cig nas spyad pa lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
222a5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni yun ring po
222a6(nyi khri): ji srid cig nas spyad pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
222a7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa bsnyen bkur nas 'dir 'ongs shing 'dir skyes pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
222b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med tshad med dpag tu med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
222b2(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/ /de ni bskal pa bye ba
222b3(nyi khri): khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ de sems dang po bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa'i pha
222b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dir 'ongs pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
222b5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dir 'ongs pa'o/ /des de nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs
222b6(nyi khri): med tshad med dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa bsnyen bkur bas/ 'dir 'ongs shing 'dir skyes pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
222b7(nyi khri): chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mthong ngam thos na/ bdag gi ston pa mthong ngo zhes bya bar sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi ston pa thos so zhes bya bar sems bskyed
223a1(nyi khri): par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mi gnyis pa dang /
223a2(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul du don dang tshul gyis rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
223a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mnyan pa'am blta bar nus lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol
223a4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la ni nyan pa med do/ /blta ba med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi nyan mi blta'o/ /chos la sems med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag
223a5(nyi khri): gis mi thos mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du chos la sems med pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
223a6(nyi khri): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo / /chos la sems med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid ni de dag gis mi thos mi
223a7(nyi khri): mthong ngo / /chos la sems med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo / /chos la sems med pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
223b1(nyi khri): rnams ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo / /chos la sems med pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang
223b2(nyi khri): chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo / /chos la sems med pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan
223b3(nyi khri): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong
223b4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo / /chos la sems med pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
223b5(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni de dag gis
223b6(nyi khri): mi thos mi mthong ngo / /chos la sems med pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo / /chos la sems med pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
223b7(nyi khri): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo / /chos la sems med pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / byang chub
224a1(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ni de dag gis mi thos mi mthong ngo // //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga
224a2(nyi khri): pa| bam po sum cu brgyad pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par bgyid pa de/
224a3(nyi khri): yun ring po ji srid cig nas spyod spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni rnam par phye zhing bshad dgos pa ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
224a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson par byed pa dang /
224a5(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
224a6(nyi khri): phyin pa la brtson par byed cing 'phel ba dang 'grib par mthong ba med pas/ chos gang yang mi spong ste/ nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas
224a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang /
224b1(nyi khri): mchod pa bya bar 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / sems bskyed pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / nam yang ma'i mngal du
224b2(nyi khri): mi skye la/ nam yang mngon par shes pa rnams dang mi 'bral zhing / nyon mongs pa gang dang yang mi 'grogs la/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang lhan cig mi gnas
224b3(nyi khri): shing | sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba de lta bu'i rnam grangs yod de/
224b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
224b5(nyi khri): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po mthong
224b6(nyi khri): zhing | de dag gi drung du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan bskyed
224b7(nyi khri): pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa yod de/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'khor de nas gud du 'dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
225a1(nyi khri): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ rim gro med pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
225a2(nyi khri): gi drung nas gud du 'dong ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol
225a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'khor de nas gud du 'dong 'dong ba ste/ de dag ni da ltar byung ba'i tshe yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'khor de nas gud du
225a4(nyi khri): 'dong bar 'gyur te/ lus dang sems kyis mthun par spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i las gsog pa yin te/ de dag gis shes rab 'chal
225a5(nyi khri): par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ spong bar 'gyur te de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spangs pas/ 'das
225a6(nyi khri): pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs par 'gyur te/ de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
225a7(nyi khri): spangs po las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas shing bsags pa dang / chos brlag par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des/ lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang /
225b1(nyi khri): lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po'i bar du sems can dmyal bar bsreg par 'gyur ro/ /de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can
225b2(nyi khri): dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur te/ de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong ba'i tshe/ mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/ chus yongs su 'jig
225b3(nyi khri): pa'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag de ltar mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung ba'i tshe'ang /
225b4(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu 'phang bar 'gyur te/ de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag tu bsreg par 'gyur ro/ /der 'phangs te der
225b5(nyi khri): skyes nas kyang / sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur te/ de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por
225b6(nyi khri): 'dong ba'i tshe/ mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung ste/ de dag de ltar mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/ chus yongs su
225b7(nyi khri): 'jig pa'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung ba'i tshe'ang / shar phyogs kyi sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu 'phang bar 'gyur/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang /
226a1(nyi khri): shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu 'phang bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag tu'ang sems
226a2(nyi khri): can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur te/ der yang mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig
226a3(nyi khri): pa 'byung ba ste/ de dag de ltar mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ de nas shi 'phos nas chos 'jig par 'gyur
226a4(nyi khri): ba'i las de ma zad pas yang 'dir skyes te/ de dag kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag der skyes nas kyang sems
226a5(nyi khri): can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de dag tu'ang mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/ chus yongs su 'jig pa'am/
226a6(nyi khri): rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa ma byung gi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag mes yongs su 'jig pa'am/ chus yongs su 'jig
226a7(nyi khri): pa'am/ rlung gis yongs su 'jig pa byung nas kyang / de dag nas shi 'phos te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu byol song gi skye gnas pa rnams dang / skal pa mnyam
226b1(nyi khri): par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu byol
226b2(nyi khri): song gi skye gnas pa rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de
226b3(nyi khri): dag der skyes nas sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad nas/ ci ste brgya la mi'i skye ba thob na'ang / chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / bsgrubs
226b4(nyi khri): pa dang / tshang ba dang / rdzogs pa'i rnam par smin pa des/ de dag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der dmus long gi rigs su skye bar 'gyur/ phyag dar ba'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur/
226b5(nyi khri): gdol pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur/ smig ma mkhan gyi rigs su skye bar 'gyur/ de dag der skyes nas kyang dmus long du 'gyur ba yin/ zha bor 'gyur ba yin/ sna med par 'gyur
226b6(nyi khri): ba yin/ lce med par 'gyur ba yin/ lag pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ rkang pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ mdze can du 'gyur ba yin/ sha bkra can du 'gyur ba yin/ sgur por
226b7(nyi khri): 'gyur ba yin/ gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra med pa dang / chos kyi sgra med pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra med pa de dag tu rtag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/
227a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mtshams ma mchis pa lngas ni/ chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i sug las
227a2(nyi khri): bgyis pa dang / bsags pa 'di'i gzugs brnyan tsam du'ang mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
227a3(nyi khri): pa zab mo 'di bstan cing bshad pa'i tshe/ phyir spang bar sems shing 'di skad du/ 'di la khyed dang bdag cag gis bslab par mi bya ste/ 'di ni chos ma yin no/ /'di ni 'dul
227a4(nyi khri): ba ma yin no/ /'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin no/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes zer zhing /
227a5(nyi khri): de bdag nyid kyang phyir spong la/ sems can gzhan yang mos pa med par byed cing / bdag gis bsam pa nyams par byas nas/ gzhan gyi bsam pa nyams par byed pa/ bdag
227a6(nyi khri): gi bsam pa gdug par byas nas/ gzhan gyi bsam pa gdug par bya bar dga' ba/ bdag nyid chud gzon cing gzhan chud gsan par dga' ba/ bdag nyid shes rab kyi pha
227a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zab mo mi shes mi rig pas phyir spang bar 'dod la/ gzhan yang de bzhin du 'dzin du 'jug pa/ de'i chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa lta la/
227b1(nyi khri): des gzugs brnyan du'ang 'gyur re skan/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngas ni gang zag de lta bu thos par bya bar yang ma gnang na 'phrad par lta ci smos te/ 'grogs par lta ci smos kyang mi smos so/ /
227b2(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang zag de lta bu dag ni chos la skyon 'dogs par rig par bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang zag de lta bu ni blo ngan pa'i tshul can/ phyogs nag po'i
227b3(nyi khri): tshul can du rig par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang zag de lta bu dag gi ngag mnyan par sems pa'am/ de dag la yid ches par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang tshul ma yin pa'i 'jigs
227b4(nyi khri): pas 'phung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyon 'dogs pa de ni/ chos la skyon 'dogs par rig par bya ste/ sems can dmyal ba pa'am/ byol
227b5(nyi khri): song gi skye gnas pa'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten par rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos la skyon 'dogs pa'i gang zag der skyes pa de'i lus kyi tshad da dung ma
227b6(nyi khri): gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos la skyon 'dogs pa'i gang zag der skyes pa'i lus kyi tshad ni ma glengs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag
227b7(nyi khri): chos la skyon 'dogs pa de'i lus kyi tshad thos na/ mod la khrag tu skyug par 'gyur ba'am/ 'chi ba'am/ srog la 'bab pa'i sdug bsngal lam/ mya ngan gyi zug rngu skye ba'am/ ldum bu
228a1(nyi khri): brngas pa ltar skam zhing rnyid par 'gyur du 'ong ste/ gang zag der skyes pa'i lus kyi tshad ni thos na'ang nyes pa de lta bu yod pa de tsam ste/ de'i lus kyi tshad
228a2(nyi khri): ni de yin ne/ /zhes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la skabs dbye ba ma mdzad do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ chos 'jig par
228a3(nyi khri): 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis shing bsags pa des/ chos la skyon 'dogs pa'i gang zag lus 'di 'dra ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bas ni/ ma byung ba'i skye bo
228a4(nyi khri): rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / tshang
228a5(nyi khri): bar byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskang ba des/ 'di srid cig tu sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /'di srid
228a6(nyi khri): cig tu byol song gi nang du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /'di srid cig tu gshin rje'i 'jig rten du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro zhes byas pa de nyid kyis kyang / ma byung ba'i skye
228a7(nyi khri): bo rnams la snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de de lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de de lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de nyid kyis kyang dkar
228b1(nyi khri): zhing rigs dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams nongs pa spong zhing / bdag cag gis de lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes srog gi don du'ang dam pa'i chos mi
228b2(nyi khri): spong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis gang zag dam pa'i
228b3(nyi khri): chos spong ba'i nongs pa brjod pa 'di thos na/ bdag cag kyang ngan song dag tu sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa de lta bu myong du 'ong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ba dang / chos mi thos pa
228b4(nyi khri): dang | dge 'dun bsnyen cing bkur du med par 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes su 'ong ngo / /mi 'phongs par 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /shin tu
228b5(nyi khri): 'jungs pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes bgyi bar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las shin tu bsdam par bgyi'o/ /yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan
228b6(nyi khri): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshig gi las bgyis shing bsags pa ni/ chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i las bgyis shing bsags par 'gyur ro/ /bcom
228b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ tshig gi las byas shing bsags pas/ chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ skyes bu
229a1(nyi khri): glen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la skyon gdags par sems shing / phyir spong bar sems pa de dag kyang chos dang 'dul ba de nyid la
229a2(nyi khri): rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyon btags shing phyir spangs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la skyon
229a3(nyi khri): btags shing phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la skyon btags shing phyir spangs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
229a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skyon btags shing phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skyon btags shing phyir spangs pas/ chos
229a5(nyi khri): la skyon btags shing phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /chos phyir spangs pas dge 'dun phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun phyir spangs pas/ 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba
229a6(nyi khri): phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba phyir spangs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
229a7(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /nang
229b1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags
229b2(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
229b3(nyi khri): 'jug pa bzhi phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
229b4(nyi khri): dang | mngon par shes pa lnga phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
229b5(nyi khri): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
229b6(nyi khri): dang | rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir spangs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir spangs pas/ bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po tshad med grangs med dpag
229b7(nyi khri): tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung bas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi
230a1(nyi khri): dwags kyi nang du sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa myong bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
230a2(nyi khri): 'das| skyes bu glen pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di slar spong ba de dag rnam pa du zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di slar spong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan
230a3(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ skyes bu glen pa de dag rnam pa bzhis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bzhi gang dang gang zhig lags/
230a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu glen pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong ba de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ rgyu
230a5(nyi khri): dang po des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ /chos zab mo rnams la yid ches pa dang / dad cing mos pa med pa yin te/ rgyu gnyis pa des
230a6(nyi khri): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba yin te/ brtson 'grus med
230a7(nyi khri): cing phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pas/ rgyu gsum pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ skyes bu glen pa de dag ni zhe sdang gi
230b1(nyi khri): spyod pa can yin te/ de dag bdag bstod cing gzhan smod par gyur pas/ rgyu bzhi pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa
230b2(nyi khri): bzhi po de dag gis skyes bu glen pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
230b3(nyi khri): 'di ni brtson 'grus chung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mi ldan zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis pa rnams kyis mos par dka'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
230b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni brtson 'grus chung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mi ldan zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu lhung ba rnams kyis
230b5(nyi khri): mos par dka'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar mos par dka' ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ji tsam du zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
230b6(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs la rang bzhin med pa ni gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
230b7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med pa ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ skye mched dang / khams
231a1(nyi khri): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rang bzhin med pa ni rten cing 'brel
231a2(nyi khri): par 'byung ba'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin med pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
231a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
231a4(nyi khri): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin med pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
231a5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid la rang bzhin med pa ni nang stong pa nyid do/ /rab
231a6(nyi khri): 'byor| phyi stong pa nyid ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ phyi stong pa nyid la rang bzhin med pa ni phyi stong pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
231a7(nyi khri): ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rang bzhin med pa ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
231b1(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rang bzhin med pa ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
231b2(nyi khri): do| |rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la rang bzhin med pa ni/ dran pa nye bar
231b3(nyi khri): bzhag pa rnams so/ /rab 'byor/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
231b4(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rang bzhin med pa ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
231b5(nyi khri): brgyad pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba
231b6(nyi khri): ste| de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rang bzhin med pa ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par
231b7(nyi khri): thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma bcings ma grol
232a1(nyi khri): ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rang bzhin med pa ni mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin
232a2(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang /
232a3(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rang bzhin med pa
232a4(nyi khri): ni| sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rab 'byor/ thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma bcings ma
232a5(nyi khri): grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rang bzhin med pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi sngon gyi
232a6(nyi khri): mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs so/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
232a7(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /rab
232b1(nyi khri): 'byor| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngon gyi mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ rnam pa thams
232b2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ phyi ma'i mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs so/ /
232b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ phyi ma'i mtha' dngos po med pa'i
232b4(nyi khri): rang bzhin ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ phyi ma'i mtha'
232b5(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi da ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ da ltar byung
232b6(nyi khri): ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs so/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i da ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir
232b7(nyi khri): zhe na/ rab 'byor/ da ltar byung ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi da ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba
233a1(nyi khri): ste| de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ da ltar byung ba'i dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
233a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus chung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba/ bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa le lo can/ brtson 'grus btang
233a3(nyi khri): ba| dran pa nyams pa/ shes bzhin dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis mos par dka'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha
233a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus chung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu lhung ba/ bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa le lo can/ brtson 'grus btang ba/ dran pa nyams
233a5(nyi khri): pa| shes bzhin dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis mos par dka'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /tshor ba
233a6(nyi khri): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
233a7(nyi khri): ba rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
233b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa
233b2(nyi khri): gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar rnam par
233b3(nyi khri): dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /'phags
233b4(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /rnam
233b5(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par
233b6(nyi khri): dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /de
233b7(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
234a1(nyi khri): pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /
234a2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gzugs yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni shes
234a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs yongs su dag pa ste/ de ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa
234a4(nyi khri): dang | shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do/ /tshor ba dang / 'dus shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
234a5(nyi khri): shes pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa
234a6(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin
234a7(nyi khri): tha mi dad do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs

242a2(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis

242a4(nyi khri): par dag pa ste/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
