278b6(nyi khri): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ gzugs zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /
278b7(nyi khri): gzugs 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am
279a1(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am
279a2(nyi khri): bdag med ces bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
279a3(nyi khri): 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar
279a4(nyi khri): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par
279a5(nyi khri): 'byung ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sdug ces bya
279a6(nyi khri): ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
279a7(nyi khri): bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston
279b1(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par
279b2(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces
279b3(nyi khri): bya ba'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zhi zhes bya ba'am/
279b4(nyi khri): ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
279b5(nyi khri): sum cu rtsa bdun 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad
279b6(nyi khri): med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
279b7(nyi khri): pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes
280a1(nyi khri): bya ba'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug
280a2(nyi khri): ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol
280a3(nyi khri): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams
280a4(nyi khri): dang | gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
280a5(nyi khri): bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma
280a6(nyi khri): zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das zhes bya ba'am/
280a7(nyi khri): ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
280b1(nyi khri): dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal
280b2(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston
280b3(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am/
280b4(nyi khri): grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam
280b5(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/
280b6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam
280b7(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
281a1(nyi khri): ro| |rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/
281a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos ni ji ltar
281a3(nyi khri): ston par 'gyur/ ston na ci zhig gis ston par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston
281a4(nyi khri): par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /skye mched
281a5(nyi khri): dang | khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa
281a6(nyi khri): nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
281a7(nyi khri): rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
281b1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston
281b2(nyi khri): par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
281b3(nyi khri): rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos
281b4(nyi khri): ston par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
281b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
281b6(nyi khri): su dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ skye
281b7(nyi khri): mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa
282a1(nyi khri): nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /'phags
282a2(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
282a3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin
282a4(nyi khri): dang | gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang
282a5(nyi khri): dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
282a6(nyi khri): kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab
282a7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
282b1(nyi khri): su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa
282b2(nyi khri): thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na
282b3(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
282b4(nyi khri): dang | stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar
282b5(nyi khri): na ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa
282b6(nyi khri): dang | so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams
282b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs la skye ba med pa
283a1(nyi khri): dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
283a2(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /
283a3(nyi khri): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rten cing 'brel
283a4(nyi khri): par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
283a5(nyi khri): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
283a6(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
283a7(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes
283b1(nyi khri): pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni
283b2(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
283b3(nyi khri): bco brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam
283b4(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag
283b5(nyi khri): pa'o| |rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs
283b6(nyi khri): su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
283b7(nyi khri): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//
284a1(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/
284a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha' la tha snyad
284a3(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
284a4(nyi khri): phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar/ nam mkha' la tha snyad med
284a5(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/
284a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
284a7(nyi khri): 'byor/ nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor /gzhan
284b1(nyi khri): yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i
284b2(nyi khri): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/
284b3(nyi khri): de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
284b4(nyi khri): dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na chos thams
284b5(nyi khri): cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
284b6(nyi khri): dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor
284b7(nyi khri): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du
285a1(nyi khri): yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad
285a2(nyi khri): dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba mi spongs
285a3(nyi khri): pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang
285a4(nyi khri): slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang / tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang /
285a5(nyi khri): bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bsod nams mang du 'phel bar
285a6(nyi khri): 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis
285a7(nyi khri): pa| gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa/ rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te /rigs
285b1(nyi khri): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
285b2(nyi khri): bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang po dang / tshad med pa grangs med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa dpag tu med pa rab
285b3(nyi khri): tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni
285b4(nyi khri): 'di yin te/ sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o//
285b5(nyi khri): rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i
285b6(nyi khri): skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
285b7(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
286a1(nyi khri): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho
286a2(nyi khri): ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa
286a3(nyi khri): gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor
286a4(nyi khri): dang | tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung
286a5(nyi khri): che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha'
286a6(nyi khri): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod
286a7(nyi khri): do| |rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub yod do/ /bla na med
286b1(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yod na/ bsam gtan bzhi yod do/ /tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
286b2(nyi khri): 'jug pa bzhi yod do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
286b3(nyi khri): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
286b4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
286b5(nyi khri): dang | mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
286b6(nyi khri): sgo thams cad yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
286b7(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te /de la
287a1(nyi khri): bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal
287a2(nyi khri): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha
287a3(nyi khri): nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba
287a4(nyi khri): dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi
287a5(nyi khri): lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi
287a6(nyi khri): lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /
287a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /de bas na de ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che
287b1(nyi khri): zhes bya'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor ba med do//
287b2(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do/ /rab
287b3(nyi khri): 'byor| pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'am/ 'dus
287b4(nyi khri): byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin
287b5(nyi khri): po che la ni gang gis kyang 'go ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor/ de'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'go
287b6(nyi khri): ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o/ /rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes par yang mi
287b7(nyi khri): byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/ /de ni
288a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing / sangs rgyas
288a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems
288a3(nyi khri): can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
288a4(nyi khri): pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa'am/ rnam par ston pa'am/ yongs su ston pa'am/ 'dzin par byed pa'am/ 'byin par byed pa'am/ skye bar byed pa'am/ 'gag par byed pa'am/
288a5(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa'am/ 'grib par byed pa'am/ 'phel bar byed pa'am/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung bar byed pa
288a6(nyi khri): med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams
288a7(nyi khri): las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
288b1(nyi khri): pa bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
288b2(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgrub
288b3(nyi khri): pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med
288b4(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong
288b5(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgrub pa
288b6(nyi khri): ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
288b7(nyi khri): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lan gcig phyir 'ong
289a1(nyi khri): ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang byang chub bsgrub pa ma yin/
289a2(nyi khri): 'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin no// //
289a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bzhi bcu gcig pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi
289a4(nyi khri): khams sgrub pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi
289a5(nyi khri): dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par thugs
289a6(nyi khri): su chud do/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo / /ston to/ /brjod do/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal
289a7(nyi khri): bar mdzad do/ /yang dag par ston to/ /de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku
289b1(nyi khri): mud dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / mnad ra ba dang / mnad ra ba chen po 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/ /kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas/ lha'i bu stong
289b2(nyi khri): phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor
289b3(nyi khri): la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba'ang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba'ang ma yin no/ /shes
289b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang chos gang yang 'khor ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha
289b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom
289b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
289b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid nang stong
290a1(nyi khri): pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag
290a2(nyi khri): pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub
290a3(nyi khri): kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan
290a4(nyi khri): rnams dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong
290a5(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
290a6(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang /
290a7(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /
290b1(nyi khri): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang byang chub rang byang chub
290b2(nyi khri): kyis stong ngo / /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /gsol pa/
290b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen mo ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/ /
290b4(nyi khri): de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bla na med
290b5(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'ang / chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo 'ang skor la chos
290b6(nyi khri): gang yang 'khor ba'am/ mi 'khor ba'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba'am/ yongs su ma mthong ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i
290b7(nyi khri): slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams
291a1(nyi khri): cad kyang shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /
291a2(nyi khri): mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags
291a3(nyi khri): so| |de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / rab tu dgod pa dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par
291a4(nyi khri): dgrol ba dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyi ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
291a5(nyi khri): pa bstan pa de'ang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ngo / /gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/ /gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis
291a6(nyi khri): pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la gang su'ang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga
291a7(nyi khri): pa las le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o/ / //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
291b1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/

292a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /

292b2(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

296a4(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
296a5(nyi khri): stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu
296a6(nyi khri): phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
296a7(nyi khri): 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
296b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa
296b2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
296b3(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid
296b4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
296b5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
296b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid
296b7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
297a1(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
297a2(nyi khri): 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta
297a3(nyi khri): ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir ro//
297a4(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
297a5(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran
297a6(nyi khri): pa nye bar bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol
297a7(nyi khri): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang mi
297b1(nyi khri): dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
297b2(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i
297b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
297b4(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
297b5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
297b6(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
297b7(nyi khri): lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
298a1(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan/ 'di lta ste/
298a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol
298a3(nyi khri): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon pa med pa dmigs
298a4(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
298a5(nyi khri): stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
298a6(nyi khri): par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
298a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa dang / ser sna dmigs su
298b1(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
298b2(nyi khri): tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
298b3(nyi khri): pa'o| / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang / bzod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
298b4(nyi khri): pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dang / brtson 'grus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
298b5(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsam gtan dang / 'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir
298b6(nyi khri): ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab dang / 'chal
298b7(nyi khri): pa'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
299a1(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi
299a2(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
299a3(nyi khri): 'das| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad
299a4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
299a5(nyi khri): bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol
299a6(nyi khri): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams
299a7(nyi khri): cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
299b1(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
299b2(nyi khri): pa'o| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu
299b3(nyi khri): lnga pa las/ le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang
299b4(nyi khri): gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la
299b5(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/ /gang 'dzin cing
299b6(nyi khri): 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin
299b7(nyi khri): nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag
300a1(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris so/ /yongs
300a2(nyi khri): su zhus so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur la/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog
300a3(nyi khri): cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
300a4(nyi khri): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
300a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur la/ 'dzin cing 'chang
300a6(nyi khri): ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar
300a7(nyi khri): bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma spyad pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
300b1(nyi khri): phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mos par bgyi bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems
300b2(nyi khri): pa dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol
300b3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
300b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
300b5(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid
300b6(nyi khri): ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong
300b7(nyi khri): ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar
301a1(nyi khri): bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
301a2(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
301a3(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi
301a4(nyi khri): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus/ yongs su ma dris
301a5(nyi khri): so| |de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab na/
301a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/ sbyin pa'i pha
301a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
301b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
301b2(nyi khri): chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par
301b3(nyi khri): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge
301b4(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas rgyas kyi chos
301b5(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
301b6(nyi khri): phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po
301b7(nyi khri): brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /kau shi ka /de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal
302a1(nyi khri): ba'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams
302a2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod do/ /kau shi ka /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos
302a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
302a4(nyi khri): cad spang bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams
302a5(nyi khri): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang /
302a6(nyi khri): rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
302a7(nyi khri): brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /khams
302b1(nyi khri): gsum gyi phul du 'byung bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /bdud thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi
302b2(nyi khri): bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
302b3(nyi khri): la brtson par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
302b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
302b5(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
302b6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
302b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na nang
303a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar
303a2(nyi khri): na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams
303a3(nyi khri): dang | gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
303a4(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid
303a5(nyi khri): pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
303a6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
303a7(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa legs so/ /legs so/ /kau shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ngo / /kau shi
303b1(nyi khri): ka |'di la byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa'i de'i tshe/ gzugs
303b2(nyi khri): la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes
303b3(nyi khri): pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /mig la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mig la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid
303b4(nyi khri): la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la
303b5(nyi khri): brtson par byed pa yin no/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ chos la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /mig gi rnam
303b6(nyi khri): par shes pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam
303b7(nyi khri): par shes pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la
304a1(nyi khri): mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /sa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe
304a2(nyi khri): sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang /
304a3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /ma rig
304a4(nyi khri): pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe ma rig pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ ma rig pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs
304a5(nyi khri): dang | skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rga shi la mi gnas pa
304a6(nyi khri): de'i tshe/ rga shi la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
304a7(nyi khri): phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
304b1(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson
304b2(nyi khri): par byed pa yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
304b3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /dran pa nye bar
304b4(nyi khri): bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /yang dag par spong
304b5(nyi khri): ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi
304b6(nyi khri): gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden
304b7(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
305a1(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rnam par thar pa
305a2(nyi khri): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas
305a3(nyi khri): te| gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
305a4(nyi khri): la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
305a5(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
305a6(nyi khri): la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
305a7(nyi khri): dang | phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rang byang chub la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rang byang chub la brtson par byed
305b1(nyi khri): pa yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
305b2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs
305b3(nyi khri): so| |gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya
305b4(nyi khri): ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de
305b5(nyi khri): lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson
305b6(nyi khri): par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par pa brgyad
305b7(nyi khri): dang | mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /ting nge
306a1(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
306a2(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
306a3(nyi khri): dang | lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam
306a4(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
306a5(nyi khri): la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
306a6(nyi khri): shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten
306a7(nyi khri): cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la brtson par byed pa yin
306b1(nyi khri): no| |pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
306b2(nyi khri): bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med
306b3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
306b4(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams
306b5(nyi khri): la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi
306b6(nyi khri): sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying
306b7(nyi khri): rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi
307a1(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam pa
307a2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
307a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dbus su mi
307a4(nyi khri): dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes
307a5(nyi khri): pa dbus su mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
307a6(nyi khri): so| |rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dbus su mi dmigs so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sngon gyi
307a7(nyi khri): mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dbus su mi dmigs so/ /'phags
307b1(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis
307b2(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mngon par
307b3(nyi khri): shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dbus su mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /
307b4(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
307b5(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
307b6(nyi khri): 'dres pa bco brgyad phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sngon gyi mthar
307b7(nyi khri): mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
308a1(nyi khri): bus| bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
308a2(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
308a3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin
308a4(nyi khri): nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin
308a5(nyi khri): nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
308a6(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
308a7(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
308b1(nyi khri): dang | so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rnam pa thams
308b2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gting dpag
308b3(nyi khri): dka'o| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /tshor ba dang /
308b4(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par
308b5(nyi khri): 'byung ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
308b6(nyi khri): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
308b7(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
309a1(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
309a2(nyi khri): gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
309a3(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
309a4(nyi khri): bar du gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis
309a5(nyi khri): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chad med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba dang /
309a6(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel
309a7(nyi khri): par 'byung ba tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
309b1(nyi khri): cu rtsa bdun tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
309b2(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
309b3(nyi khri): pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /de bzhin
309b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
309b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji
309b6(nyi khri): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
309b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor
310a1(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /skye mched
310a2(nyi khri): dang | khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid
310a3(nyi khri): thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
310a4(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
310a5(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
310a6(nyi khri): pa la spyod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
310a7(nyi khri): dang | mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
310b1(nyi khri): spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
310b2(nyi khri): phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bzhi bcu gnyis pa/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
310b3(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa
310b4(nyi khri): de ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi zab pa nyid gang yin
310b5(nyi khri): pa de ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i
310b6(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
310b7(nyi khri): dang | mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin
311a1(nyi khri): pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
311a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi zab
311a3(nyi khri): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
311a4(nyi khri): gal te gzugs gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
311a5(nyi khri): pa gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gting dpag dka'o zhes
311a6(nyi khri): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gting
311a7(nyi khri): dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs
311b1(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
311b2(nyi khri): dang | mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka'o
311b3(nyi khri): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
311b4(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gting dpag dka'o zhes
311b5(nyi khri): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang /
311b6(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gting dpag
311b7(nyi khri): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
312a1(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /

312a4(nyi khri): rtsa bdun tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams
312a5(nyi khri): dang | gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
312a6(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
312a7(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
312b1(nyi khri): par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
312b2(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar du tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs
312b3(nyi khri): ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
312b4(nyi khri): kyi bar du tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
312b5(nyi khri): 'di ni de ltar thab bo/ /de ltar gting dpag dka'o/ /de ltar rtogs par dka'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'o//
312b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
312b7(nyi khri): 'di thos nas 'jigs dngangs shing skrag par 'gyur du mchi'o/ /the tshom dang ne ma nur 'tshal du mchi'o/ /mos pa ma mchis par 'gyur du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyir
313a1(nyi khri): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan par bgyi ste/ des ni shes
