342b4(nyi khri): lags| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa rnams kyi ming ni yongs su mi brjod de/ de la bdag
342b5(nyi khri): gi ming yang 'di las mi 'byung / bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal gyi ming yang mi 'byung ngo zhes/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyan to snyam
342b6(nyi khri): byed cing / 'khor de nas 'gro bar sems na/ sems bskyed pa des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing / gom pa ji snyed cig bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur
342b7(nyi khri): te| de dag la gzod brtson par bya dgos so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing / mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa de dag kun
343a1(nyi khri): chub par bya bar sems te/ des na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
343a2(nyi khri): nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te/ de nyid kyi yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma la 'ju bar sems par gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
343a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'i mdo sde kun
343a4(nyi khri): chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur ba de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang
343a5(nyi khri): ldan pa de dag ste/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang /
343a6(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
343a7(nyi khri): ste| de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
343b1(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur gyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par mi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor/
343b2(nyi khri): de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing / kun chub par bya bar sems pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
343b3(nyi khri): kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin las byung ba ni/ 'jig rten pa dang
343b4(nyi khri): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig
343b5(nyi khri): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyi la la zhig rje bo'i zan nar ma bor te/ las mi las
343b6(nyi khri): zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du/ rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
343b7(nyi khri): phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la
344a1(nyi khri): brten par sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
344a2(nyi khri): gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor nas/ khe dang bkur
344a3(nyi khri): sti'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde rnams kun chub par bya bar sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
344a4(nyi khri): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig glang po 'dod la/ des glang po rnyed kyang / glang po'i rjes btsal bar sems pa yod
344a5(nyi khri): na| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
344a6(nyi khri): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing mdo sde gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs
344a7(nyi khri): rgyas dang ldan pa de dag btsal bar sems pa dag kyang dpe de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su
344b1(nyi khri): rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po blta bar 'dod la/ ba lang gi rjes btsal bar sems shing / des ba lang gi rmig rjes mthong nas kyang 'di
344b2(nyi khri): snyam du/ rgya mtsho chen po'i tshad 'di dang mnyam mam/ mi mnyam snyam na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom
344b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
344b4(nyi khri): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/ nyan
344b5(nyi khri): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems
344b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phywa mkhan nam phywa mkhan gyi slob ma rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du
344b7(nyi khri): khang pa zhig dbub cing bslang bar 'dod de/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang yongs su btsal bar sems shing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang las tshad blang bar sems
345a1(nyi khri): na| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang dpe tshul
345a2(nyi khri): bzung ste/ de dang 'dra ba'i khang pa dbub par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/
345a3(nyi khri): phywa mkhan nam phywa mkhan gyi slob ma de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu de ni byis pa'i ngang tshul can du rig par bgyi ste/ mkhas
345a4(nyi khri): pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
345a5(nyi khri): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos
345a6(nyi khri): dang | rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa byung na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/
345a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags
345b1(nyi khri): so| |bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi
345b2(nyi khri): las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la/ des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas
345b3(nyi khri): 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po kha dog dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba zhig yod ces/ des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang / dbyibs kyi mtshan ma gzung bar
345b4(nyi khri): bsams te/ 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma'ang sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra ba zhig yod grang zhes zer na/ rab
345b5(nyi khri): 'byor| de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni ma lags so/ /
345b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes
345b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde
346a1(nyi khri): dag las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i
346a2(nyi khri): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

346a4(nyi khri): bkres pa la la zhig gis/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas rnyed kyang / drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal par sems shing / des kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de bor nas/ drug cu
346a5(nyi khri): pa'i kha zas la bza' bar bsams na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni

346a7(nyi khri): kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di por zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang

346b4(nyi khri): la zhig gis nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa rnyed nas/ nor bu mching bu dang bsgrun par bsams na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can
346b5(nyi khri): yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin
346b6(nyi khri): du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab
346b7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa

347a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ spobs pa mang po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i dkrugs mar 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar
347a5(nyi khri): 'gyur ba 'di ltar/ gzugs kyi spobs pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa

347a7(nyi khri): pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i spobs pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / yang dag
347b1(nyi khri): par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge
347b2(nyi khri): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
347b3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
347b4(nyi khri): pa dang / shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang /
347b5(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spobs pa med pas
347b6(nyi khri): rnam par byang ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
347b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'o//
348a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brjod du med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
348a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos
348a3(nyi khri): de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la med cing mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes
348a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
348a5(nyi khri): bu mo de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
348a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de lta ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe
348a7(nyi khri): na| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
348b1(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang
348b2(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
348b3(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
348b4(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin
348b5(nyi khri): te mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi
348b6(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni
348b7(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ dngos po med pas dngos po med pa bri bar mi nus so/ /rab 'byor/ gal te byang
349a1(nyi khri): c hub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dngos po med ces bya bar
349a2(nyi khri): 'du shes na/ de'ang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes
349a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchi na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
349a4(nyi khri): la yi ger mngon par chags pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma
349a5(nyi khri): mchis pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
349a6(nyi khri): yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /tshor ba dang /

349b1(nyi khri): pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /

349b6(nyi khri): te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la/ yi ge ma mchis
349b7(nyi khri): pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin
350a1(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid
350a2(nyi khri): pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la

350a6(nyi khri): bgyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
350a7(nyi khri): pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags par bgyid na/ de'ang byang chub
350b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/
350b2(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin
350b3(nyi khri): pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa'i tshe yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po skyed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub
350b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bzhi bcu bzhi
350b5(nyi khri): pa| rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton bya ba dang /
350b6(nyi khri): zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa'i tshe grong gi yid la bya ba dang / grong rdal gyi yid
350b7(nyi khri): la bya ba dang / khams kyi yid la bya ba dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang / khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang / mkhan po'i yid la bya ba dang / pha dang ma dang /
351a1(nyi khri): phu nu dang sring mo dang / gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / rkun po dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phyag bdar ba dang ldan
351a2(nyi khri): pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 'jig rten dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / stu 'tshong ma dang ldan pa dang / bud med dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / yid la bya ba gzhan mang
351a3(nyi khri): po skye na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
351a4(nyi khri): yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 'gyur ba nye bar sbyor te/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las
351a5(nyi khri): su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ khe
351a6(nyi khri): dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / chos gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po byung la/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
351a7(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/
351b1(nyi khri): de dag gi ro myong bar byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
351b2(nyi khri): 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar chad de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub
351b3(nyi khri): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid
351b4(nyi khri): la byed pa dang sgom pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can dag mdo sde zab mo gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i
351b5(nyi khri): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag nye bar bsnyen par byed de/ de la byang chub sems
351b6(nyi khri): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos thabs mkhas pas bdud kyis bsnyen pa'i mdo sde zab mo de dag la 'dod pa mi bskyed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe
351b7(nyi khri): na| de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mi mkhas pa dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
352a1(nyi khri): phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems te/ de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa'ang
352a2(nyi khri): rgya cher bstan te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las kyang / thabs mkhas pa rgya cher btsal bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg
352a3(nyi khri): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las thabs mkhas
352a4(nyi khri): pas btsal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

352a6(nyi khri): ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya bar dga' la/ chos smra ba ni phyi bshol byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig
352a7(nyi khri): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya bar phyi bshol mi byed la/

352b4(nyi khri): cing | gos dang zas dang mal cha dang nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad lhur len la/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams
352b5(nyi khri): pa| dran pa nye bar bzhag pa/ mi g.yeng ba/ sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/ khe dang bkur stis 'jigs na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab

353a6(nyi khri): gsum pa par gyur la/ chos nyan pa ni dgon pa pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms pa ma yin/ phyag bdar khrod pa ma yin/ zas phyis mi len pa ma yin/ stan gcig pa ma

358a5(nyi khri): byed pa yin la/ chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu
358a6(nyi khri): rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig bu ste/
358a7(nyi khri): zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos smra ba ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang /
358b1(nyi khri): kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig
358b2(nyi khri): pu ste/ zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos nyan pa ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa
358b3(nyi khri): dang | kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor /de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan
358b4(nyi khri): pa ni gcig pu ste/ zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos smra ba ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog
358b5(nyi khri): pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra
358b6(nyi khri): ba ni 'di skad du su'ang phyi bzhin du 'brang ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir sbyin no zhes zer la/ chos nyan pa ni phyi bzhin mi 'brang na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
358b7(nyi khri): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /
359a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni/ chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni drung du 'gro ba'i skabs mi 'byed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang
359a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
359a3(nyi khri): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par 'dod/ klog
359a4(nyi khri): tu gzhug par 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par 'dod/ smra bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir drung du 'gro bar ma mos na/ rab 'byor/
359a5(nyi khri): de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
359a6(nyi khri): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'dod/ mnyan pa'i bar du 'dod la/
359a7(nyi khri): chos smra ba ni zang zing cung zad kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par mi 'dod/ nyan par gzhug pa'i bar du mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
359b1(nyi khri): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig
359b2(nyi khri): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes
359b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud
359b4(nyi khri): kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab
359b5(nyi khri): 'byor| de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
359b6(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas dkon pa dang / chu dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni
359b7(nyi khri): 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang
360a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang na zas dkon pa dang / chu
360a2(nyi khri): dkon pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha
360a3(nyi khri): ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na
360a4(nyi khri): zas mod pa dang / chu mod pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa'ang rjes su 'brang na/ des de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod zang zing gi don du song ste ci rung / legs par bsam pa
360a5(nyi khri): sems par gyis shig/ zas thob ma thob dang / bsod mi bsod kyis 'gyod par gyur ta re zhes zer na/ de'i phyir chos ston pa des kyang / thabs phra mos chos la spang ba byas par 'gyur te/ de'ang
360a6(nyi khri): mi dga' zhing 'di snyam du 'du shes te/ 'di ni sbyin par 'dod pa'i mtshan ma ma yin gyi/ spong ba'i mtshan ma yin no snyam na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
360a7(nyi khri): 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
360b1(nyi khri): gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba ni gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / sprul gyi 'jigs
360b2(nyi khri): pa dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa dag kyang chos kyi don du chos kyis skom zhing rjes su 'brang na/ dge slong chos smra bas chos nyan pa de dag la
360b3(nyi khri): 'di skad smras te/ rigs kyi bu dag /khyed gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / sbrul gyi
360b4(nyi khri): 'jigs pa dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa der dong ste ci rung zhes/ de ltar dge slong chos smra ba des chos mi bstan pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir
360b5(nyi khri): gzhug par mi 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par mi 'dod/ lung 'bog par mi 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par mi 'dod/ nyan du gzhug par mi 'dod par gyur la/ de dag gis dge
360b6(nyi khri): slong chos smra ba'i tshig de thos nas/ mi dga' zhing mi dga' ba'i tshul can du gyur te /dge slong chos smra ba gang na ba der 'gro bar mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi
360b7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi
361a1(nyi khri): las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor byed par gyur te/ de bsod
361a2(nyi khri): snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor gyur pas/ bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer de dag yang dang yang blta bar sems shing / der yang dang yang blta bas chos nyan pa
361a3(nyi khri): phyir zlog cing / tshe dang ldan pa dag /ngas ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong blta dgos te/ bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong du 'gro dgos so zhes nas/ des chos nyan
361a4(nyi khri): pa de dag phyir zlog pas phyir dong na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste /
361a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / ci nas kyang
361a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su yang 'dri bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lung 'bog par mi 'gyur ba dang / kha ton byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid
361a7(nyi khri): la byed par mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
361b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du bgyis shing / ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su'ang 'dri bar mi 'gyur ba
361b2(nyi khri): dang | lung 'bog par mi 'gyur ba dang / kha ton bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
361b3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing 'di skad du nged kyis ji ltar khong du chud pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
361b4(nyi khri): yin te/ ji skad du khyed klog pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /zhes dbyen byed cing zlog la mos pa med par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de la bdud sdig to can gyis
361b5(nyi khri): de ltar dbyen byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' gang lung ma bstan pa de dag ni the tshom skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag the tshom du gyur nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
361b6(nyi khri): 'di mi 'dri bar 'gyur/ mi klog par 'gyur/ lung mi 'bog par 'gyur/ kha ton mi byed par 'gyur/ mi sgom par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed par 'gyur te/ rab
361b7(nyi khri): 'byor| de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems
362a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas nas/
362a2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs shing / 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
362a3(nyi khri): pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed par 'gyur te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
362a4(nyi khri): bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ni rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer na /des tshig de thos nas
362a5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i
362a6(nyi khri): rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha
362a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bar chad du 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi las mang du 'byung ste/ bdud kyi las de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud
362b1(nyi khri): kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rig par byas nas rnam par spang bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
362b2(nyi khri): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdud kyi las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bgyi ste/ spang bar bgyi ba de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
362b3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
362b4(nyi khri): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las te/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'
362b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/ rnam par spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag kyang / byang chub
362b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/ rnam par spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
362b7(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang
363a1(nyi khri): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
363a2(nyi khri): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
363a3(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
363a4(nyi khri): po la nye bar bsten te/ de'ang de la dga' ba skyed na/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan
363a5(nyi khri): pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha
363a6(nyi khri): byad du lus gser gyi kha dog dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'od 'dom gang bar ldan par byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
363a7(nyi khri): drung du 'ongs te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mos pa skyed do/ /des mos pa bskyed nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su
363b1(nyi khri): nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang
363b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i mdun du
363b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nye bar ston to/ /des de la 'dod pa bskyed cing bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
363b4(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bur shog cig / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang / tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /
363b5(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa 'di chos ji ltar ston pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos bstan par bgyi'o/ /zhes de de la 'dod pa bskyed pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
363b6(nyi khri): las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa
363b7(nyi khri): ste| rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag byang chub sems dpa' brgya
364a1(nyi khri): phrag du ma/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul
364a2(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
364a3(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa de lta bu dag nye bar ston te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po de dag la 'dod pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /des de dag la 'dod pa bskyed nas rnam pa thams cad
364a4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton
364a5(nyi khri): byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par
364a6(nyi khri): bya'o| |rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gzugs med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med do/ /
364a7(nyi khri): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams med do/ /stong pa nyid rnams med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med do/ /'phags
364b1(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams med do/ /bsam gtan rnams med do/ /tshad med pa rnams med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad med do/ /mthar
364b2(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams med do/ /ting nge
364b3(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi med do/ /byams pa
364b4(nyi khri): chen po med do/ /snying rje chen po med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
364b5(nyi khri): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub med do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do/ /rab 'byor/ gang la gzugs med pa dang / tshor ba dang /
364b6(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / skye mched med pa dang / khams med pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams med pa dang /
364b7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid rnams med pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams med pa dang / tshad med pa rnams med
365a1(nyi khri): pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad med pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
365a2(nyi khri): pa dgu med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa dang / mngon par shes rnams med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams med pa dang /
365a3(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med pa dang / snying rje chen
365a4(nyi khri): po med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
365a5(nyi khri): bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub med pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang
365a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas med do/ /nyan thos med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
365a7(nyi khri): ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri pa dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa
365b1(nyi khri): dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la'ang bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ngo / /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ '+dzam+bu'i gling 'di'i rin po che gser dang / nor bu dang / mu
365b2(nyi khri): tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram gang ji snyed cig yod pa dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing / phyir rgol ba mang ba dag go /rab 'byor
365b3(nyi khri): de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid
365b4(nyi khri): la byed pa de dag la'ang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
365b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ de ni de bzhin no/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni de bzhin te/ '+dzam+bu'i gling 'di'i rin po che gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang /
365b6(nyi khri): byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing slar rgol ba mang pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs
365b7(nyi khri): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag la'ang
366a1(nyi khri): bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /slar rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
366a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang /
366a3(nyi khri): ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dag gi bar chad bgyid pa ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu glen pa de dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyur ro//
366a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa
366a5(nyi khri): dang | ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gi bar chad bgyid pa de dag ni/ blo rgya shin tu chung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs po che dag la de dag gi sems
366a6(nyi khri): mi 'jug go / de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri/ mi klog /lung mi 'bog /kha ton mi bgyid/ mi sgom/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi bgyid de/ gzhan 'dri

366b4(nyi khri): gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa dag ste/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi

366b6(nyi khri): bzhin du yid la byed ba de dag gi bar chad byed pa de dag ni blo rgya shin tu chung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs po che dag la de dag gi sems mi 'jug go /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

367a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog cing kha ton byed pa dang / tshul
367a2(nyi khri): bzhin du yid la byed cing / gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
367a3(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi

368a1(nyi khri): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang /

368a6(nyi khri): yod na/ de dag ni ma de ci nas kyang mi na bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed cing / bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na nad med par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di la ji ltar na bar chad du mi
368a7(nyi khri): 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di ring du 'tsho bar byed na ji ltar bya/ bdag cag gi ma 'di lus la mi bde ba'i nyams
368b1(nyi khri): med par bya na ji ltar bya/ 'di ni bdag cag gi skyed bskyed pa ste/ srog gi sbyin bdag go /zhes de dag ma de la rim gro legs par bya bas rim gro byed do/ /de dag ni 'di'i srog gi bar

368b4(nyi khri): rten 'di ston pa'o/ /zhes bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rgyun du rim gro byed cing / bsti stang dang bkur sti cher byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
368b5(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gzigs shing dgongs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

369a1(nyi khri): dang | chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun mi

369b1(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'di las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam

370b6(nyi khri): gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 'jig rten gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ phung po lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du gsungs so/ /gsol pa/
370b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mos phung po lnga ni ji ltar bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ji ltar phung po lnga ston pa lags/
371a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po lnga po 'di dag 'jig par ston pa ma yin/ rab tu 'jig par ston pa ma yin te/
371a2(nyi khri): skye zhes bya bar mi ston to/ /'gag ces bya bar mi ston to/ /kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba dang / rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang / 'phel zhes bya ba dang / 'grib ces bya ba dang / blang zhes

371a4(nyi khri): do| / mtshan ma med pa la 'jig pa'am/ rab tu 'jig pa med do/ /smon pa med pa la 'jig pa'am/ rab tu 'jig pa med do/ /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'jig pa'am/ rab tu 'jig
371a5(nyi khri): pa med do/ /skye ba med pa la 'jig pa'am/ rab tu 'jig pa med do/ /dngos po med pa la 'jig pa'am/ rab tu 'jig pa med do/ /rang bzhin med pa la 'jig pa'am/ rab tu 'jig pa
371a6(nyi khri): med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten ston par gsungs te/ rab 'byor/ sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems
371a7(nyi khri): dang spyod pa mkhyen pa de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten cing rab tu mkhyen te/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni sems can med do/ /sems
371b1(nyi khri): can du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med do/ gzugs su gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med do/ /rnam par shes par gdags
371b2(nyi khri): pa mi dmigs so/ /mig med do/ /gzugs med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ /mig tu gdags pa
371b3(nyi khri): mi dmigs so/ /gzugs su gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus
371b4(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rna ba med do/ /sgra med do/ /sna med do/ /dri med do/ /lce med do/ /ro med do/ /lus med do/ /reg bya med do/ /yid med do/ /chos med
371b5(nyi khri): do| |yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do/ /yid du gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /chos su gdags pa mi dmigs
371b6(nyi khri): so| |yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /
371b7(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams med do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams med do/ /stong pa nyid thams cad med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
372a1(nyi khri): med do/ /bsam gtan rnams med do/ /tshad med pa rnams med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad
372a2(nyi khri): med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams
372a3(nyi khri): med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
372a4(nyi khri): med do/ /snying rje chen po med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
372a5(nyi khri): gdags pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ston pa yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
372a6(nyi khri): phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzugs ston par byed pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ston par byed pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
372a7(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar du ston par byed pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la med cing mi
372b1(nyi khri): dmigs na/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yod pa'am/ dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'am/
372b2(nyi khri): dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang sems can ji snyed cig gdags su yod pa/ gzugs yod pa'am/ gzugs med pa'am/ 'du shes yod pa'am/ 'du shes med
372b3(nyi khri): pa'am/ 'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin/ 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag gi'ang rung ste/ de dag gi sems
372b4(nyi khri): bsdus pa dang / spros pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sems bsdus pa dang / spros par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems
372b5(nyi khri): can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang / spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang / spros pa
372b6(nyi khri): ni chos nyid kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang / spros pa chos nyid gang
372b7(nyi khri): gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni chos nyid gang la chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na sems bsdus pa dang / spros pa lta
373a1(nyi khri): smos kyang mi smos pa'i chos nyid des/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang / spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen
373a2(nyi khri): to| rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang / spros pa yang dag pa ji
373a3(nyi khri): lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang / spros pa
373a4(nyi khri): de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa
373a5(nyi khri): dang | spros pa ni zad pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can
373a6(nyi khri): de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang / spros pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gag pa dang / spong ba'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs
373a7(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang / spros pa ni zhi ba dang / dben pa'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
373b1(nyi khri): mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang / spros pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
373b2(nyi khri): du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la/ 'dod
373b3(nyi khri): chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
373b4(nyi khri): bzhin du rab mkhyen to/ /zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la/ zhe
373b5(nyi khri): sdang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
373b6(nyi khri): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la/ gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji
373b7(nyi khri): ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems
374a1(nyi khri): zhes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/ ji ltar na zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bcas pa la gti mug dang
374a2(nyi khri): bcas pa'i sems zhes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa gang
374a3(nyi khri): yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med de/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang

374a5(nyi khri): sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med de/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su
374a6(nyi khri): med na/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'am/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ sems gti mug dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni/ sems kyi yang dag pa ji
374a7(nyi khri): lta ba nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med de/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su med na/ gti
374b1(nyi khri): mug dang bcas pa'am/ gti mug dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/ sems
374b2(nyi khri): can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la/ zhe sdang dang

374b5(nyi khri): lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor/ sems 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/ sems kyi 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid
374b6(nyi khri): ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral

375a1(nyi khri): dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor/ sems zhe sdang dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/ sems kyi
375a2(nyi khri): zhe sdang dang bcas pa nyid ma yin te/ zhe sdang dang bral ba nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs
375a3(nyi khri): pas sems can de dag gi sems zhe sdang dang bral ba la/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na de bzhin
375a4(nyi khri): gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems gti mug dang bral ba la/ gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor/ sems

375a6(nyi khri): pa med de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems gti mug dang bral ba la/ gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
375a7(nyi khri): rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems rgya che ba la/
375b1(nyi khri): sems rgya che zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang /

375b3(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems de rgya che bar mi 'gyur/ sems de rgya chung bar mi 'gyur/ sems de 'phel bar mi 'gyur/ sems de 'grib
375b4(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur/ sems de 'ong bar mi 'gyur/ sems de 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ sems de dngos po med pas rgya che bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ rgya chung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'phel
375b5(nyi khri): par 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'grib par 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'ong bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'gro bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
375b6(nyi khri): ltar sems la gang gis rgya chen por 'gyur ba'am/ rgya chung ngur 'gyur ba'am/ 'phel bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'grib par 'gyur ba'am/ 'ong bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i ngo bo
375b7(nyi khri): nyid med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/

376b6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems gnas par yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs/ rnam par gnas pa dang / yongs su gnas pa dang / nye
376b7(nyi khri): bar gnas par yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems kyi rgyud ni rten med cing tshad med pa ste/ sems kyi rgyud de dag la gang la gnas par bya ba'i rten

377b6(nyi khri): 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga la/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems de dag snang bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
377b7(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems bltar med pa la/ bltar med

378a6(nyi khri): dang | bkram pa dang / bcum pa gang ji snyed cig skye zhing 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang gzugs la brten/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la
378a7(nyi khri): brten pas skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems de dag rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa
378b1(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang / 'du

378b3(nyi khri): rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba dang / 'du ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcum pa rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ bdag dang 'jig rten rtag ces bya ba de nyid ba den gyi/ gzhan
378b4(nyi khri): ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni/ gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig rten mi rtag ces bya ba
378b5(nyi khri): de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni/ gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig
378b6(nyi khri): rten rtag kyang rtag la/ mi rtag kyang mi rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
378b7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa 'ang ma yin/ mi rtag pa'ang ma yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la
379a1(nyi khri): gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan pa zhes bya ba
379a2(nyi khri): de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig
379a3(nyi khri): rten ni mtha' dang mi ldan pa zhes bya de ni bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
379a4(nyi khri): la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan pa'ang yin la/ mtha' dang mi ldan pa'ang yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la
379a5(nyi khri): gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mtha' dang mi ldan pa'ang
379a6(nyi khri): ma yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med do zhes bya de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /
379a7(nyi khri): lus de srog dang ldan zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
379b1(nyi khri): la gnas pa'o/ /srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ /gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
379b2(nyi khri): dang | rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas yod ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba dang /
379b3(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas med ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas yod kyang yod la/ med
379b4(nyi khri): kyang med ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas yod par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin/ med par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni don med do zhes bya ba de ni
379b5(nyi khri): gzugs la gnas pa'o/ /de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs
379b6(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems 'phro ba
379b7(nyi khri): dang / 'du ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
380a1(nyi khri): zab mo 'di la brten te/ gzugs mkhyen to/ /gzugs ji ltar mkhyen ce na/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa
380a2(nyi khri): med la/ mtshan ma med cing byed pa med de| spros pa med cing dmigs su med pa de ltar mkhyen to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mkhyen to/ /rnam par shes
380a3(nyi khri): pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ mtshan ma med cing byed pa med de/ spros pa med cing dmigs su med pa de
380a4(nyi khri): ltar mkhyen to/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems
380a5(nyi khri): 'phro ba dang / 'du ba dang / bkram pa dang / bcum pa rnams kyang de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rab mkhyen to/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par
380a6(nyi khri): rtog pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du mkhyen to/ /de ltar na 'phro ba dang / 'du ba dang /
380a7(nyi khri): bkram pa dang / bcum pa'i da bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ phung po'i de bzhin nyid do/ /phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /skye mched kyi de
380b1(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ khams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid do/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid
380b2(nyi khri): gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid
380b3(nyi khri): gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid do/ /byang chub
380b4(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/ /bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshad med pa bzhi'i de bzhin
380b5(nyi khri): nyid do/ /tshad med pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin
380b6(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa lnga'i de bzhin nyid do/ /mngon par shes pa lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad
380b7(nyi khri): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
381a1(nyi khri): de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
381a2(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid gang
381a3(nyi khri): yin pa de ni/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig ba bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/ /so so yang dag par
381a4(nyi khri): rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid do/ /byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid do/ /snying
381a5(nyi khri): rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
381a6(nyi khri): de ni| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /dge ba'i
381a7(nyi khri): chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams
381b1(nyi khri): kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi
381b2(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi
381b3(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid do/ /zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /'das pa dang / ma
381b4(nyi khri): 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos
381b5(nyi khri): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
381b6(nyi khri): 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de
381b7(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /rang byang chub kyi de bzhin
382a1(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid
382a2(nyi khri): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa nyid de tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /tha
382a3(nyi khri): mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mi zad pa ste mi zad pa'i phyir gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de bzhin
382a4(nyi khri): gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rab 'byor/ de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ de
382a5(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa'o/ /'jig rten 'di ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ chos thams
382a6(nyi khri): cad kyi de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do/ /de bzhin nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
382a7(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
382b1(nyi khri): dang | gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid des
382b2(nyi khri): na| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub brjod cing smos so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / gang zag lta
382b3(nyi khri): ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams ma gtogs par su zhig 'di la mos par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag mngon
382b4(nyi khri): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la gsungs pa ni shin tu zab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mi zad pa ste/
382b5(nyi khri): ci'i phyir mi zad ce na/ chos thams cad ni mi zad pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bla na med pa yang
382b6(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la gsungs te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
382b7(nyi khri): phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u sum cu gnyis pa'o// //de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
383a1(nyi khri): gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong
383a2(nyi khri): sti phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs
383a3(nyi khri): yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad na/
383a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
383a5(nyi khri): zab mo 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
383a6(nyi khri): mo 'di ni/ smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
383a7(nyi khri): phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ 'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol
383b1(nyi khri): rab tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ rnam par byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes
383b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes
383b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes
383b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang / de bzhin gshegs pas
383b5(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi brdar bka' stsal te/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /lha'i bu dag/ mtshan nyid de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis gzhan du bya bar mi nus so/ /
383b6(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang mtshan nyid der zad de/ lha'i bu dag/ mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid gzhan du mi byed do/ /mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid
383b7(nyi khri): shes par mi byed do/ /mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa shes par mi byed do/ /mtshan nyid med pa ni mtshan nyid med pa shes par mi byed do/ /de ltar na mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med
384a1(nyi khri): pa dang / mtshan nyid yod pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa de gnyis ka la'ang gang gis shes par bya ba dang / gang shes par bya ba dang / gang shes par byed pa
384a2(nyi khri): de lta bu mi srid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ mtshan nyid de dag ni gzugs kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pas 'du byas pa ma yin
384a3(nyi khri): no| |skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
384a4(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid
384a5(nyi khri): thams cad kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /bsam gtan
384a6(nyi khri): dang | tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
384a7(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
384b1(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis 'du byas pa ma yin no/ /lha'i bu dag/
384b2(nyi khri): mtshan nyid de dag ni mi'am/ mi ma yin pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyis
384b3(nyi khri): ma yin te/ lha'i bu dag/ la la zhig 'di skad du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gang yin zhes zer na/ ci de yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
384b4(nyi khri): de ni ma lags te/ yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra ba ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid gang yang
384b5(nyi khri): ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid med
384b6(nyi khri): pa'i dbyings de ni de bzhin du gnas so/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas ma nor bar mngon par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin
384b7(nyi khri): gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mtshan
385a1(nyi khri): nyid de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa chos thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis par 'jug cing
385a2(nyi khri): mtshan nyid de dag la zhugs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid thams cad kyi chags
385a3(nyi khri): pa las 'das pa 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bstan pas mtshan nyid
385a4(nyi khri): rnams rab tu bstan pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ mtshan nyid zab mo mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
385a5(nyi khri): mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur te/ de la spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
385a6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
385a7(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu dbye bar mdzad de/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
