444b1(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
444b2(nyi khri): 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
444b3(nyi khri): 'di ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
444b4(nyi khri): 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso
444b5(nyi khri): ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom
444b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
444b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
445a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
445a2(nyi khri): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
445a3(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa rnam
445a4(nyi khri): par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs
445a5(nyi khri): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden
445a6(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
445a7(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
445b1(nyi khri): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
445b2(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
445b3(nyi khri): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
445b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par
445b5(nyi khri): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
445b6(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
445b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
446a1(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
446a2(nyi khri): pa'o| |rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
446a3(nyi khri): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba
446a4(nyi khri): po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams
446a5(nyi khri): cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid thams cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab
446a6(nyi khri): 'byor| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
446a7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa
446b1(nyi khri): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge
446b2(nyi khri): 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi
446b3(nyi khri): 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
446b4(nyi khri): lta ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
446b5(nyi khri): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par
446b6(nyi khri): chags pa med dam zhes/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//
446b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
447a1(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
447a2(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems
447a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
447a4(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
447a5(nyi khri): su brtag par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa'
447a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
447a7(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
447b1(nyi khri): par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag
447b2(nyi khri): par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
447b3(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /
447b4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
447b5(nyi khri): bya'o| |phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis
447b6(nyi khri): bstan pa la snying por mi blta'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad pas
447b7(nyi khri): mi 'gro'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems
448a1(nyi khri): bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pa'i 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog pa'i
448a2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi
448a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan
448a4(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam zhes yongs su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
448a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur la zhum pa dang / yongs su zhum
448a6(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga' la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub
448a7(nyi khri): par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha
448b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o/ /de
448b2(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag
448b3(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur la zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing de'i yid phyir mi ldog la thos nas kyang ched du 'dzin cing 'chang la klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin
448b4(nyi khri): du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe mi 'jigs
448b5(nyi khri): mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha
448b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
448b7(nyi khri): pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol
449a1(nyi khri): ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
449a2(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa
449a3(nyi khri): yin| rab 'byor/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa
449a4(nyi khri): med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam
449a5(nyi khri): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa
449a6(nyi khri): dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rmi
449a7(nyi khri): lam dang / gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
449b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bzhi bcu dgu pa/ gsol
449b2(nyi khri): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur
449b3(nyi khri): zhing mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam
449b4(nyi khri): par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / mngon par
449b5(nyi khri): 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sgra brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
449b6(nyi khri): pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
449b7(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rtog pa lags sam/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /
450a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan
450a2(nyi khri): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
450a3(nyi khri): dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo
450a4(nyi khri): rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang /
450a5(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
450a6(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
450a7(nyi khri): pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
450b1(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med
450b2(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
450b3(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
450b4(nyi khri): rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la
450b5(nyi khri): rtog pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin
450b6(nyi khri): pa de ni sus kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du'ang ma song / phyogs na'ang mi gnas/ yul na'ang mi gnas/ gang na'ang
450b7(nyi khri): mi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dmigs so/ /'gro ba dang 'ong ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /gang la grangs mi dmigs shing / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de la ni/ gang gis kyang
451a1(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te gzugs kyis ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /skye
451a2(nyi khri): mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
451a3(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /dngos
451a4(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
451a5(nyi khri): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
451a6(nyi khri): bar gyis ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshor ba nyid dang / 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed nyid dang / rnam par shes pa
451a7(nyi khri): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
451b1(nyi khri): ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
451b2(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /skye mched dang /
451b3(nyi khri): khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /
451b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
451b5(nyi khri): gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par
451b6(nyi khri): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
451b7(nyi khri): shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
452a1(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen
452a2(nyi khri): po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
452a3(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u sum cu bdun pa'o// //de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod
452a4(nyi khri): pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da ri ka mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na
452a5(nyi khri): ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to/ /gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod
452a6(nyi khri): do| |'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar de bzhin
452a7(nyi khri): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
452b1(nyi khri): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
452b2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
452b3(nyi khri): nyid kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
452b4(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
452b5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
452b6(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos
452b7(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o/ /yang dag par
453a1(nyi khri): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa
453a2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa
453a3(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /rnam
453a4(nyi khri): par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
453a5(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
453a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang
453a7(nyi khri): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
453b1(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
453b2(nyi khri): gnyis su byar med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
453b3(nyi khri): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
453b4(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
453b5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
453b6(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
453b7(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
454a1(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dran pa
454a2(nyi khri): nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
454a3(nyi khri): byar med do/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin
454a4(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /'phags
454a5(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
454a6(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
454a7(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
454b1(nyi khri): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid
454b2(nyi khri): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i
454b3(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas
454b4(nyi khri): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /zhes
454b5(nyi khri): ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu ma mchis la/ rtog
454b6(nyi khri): ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
454b7(nyi khri): 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag /
455a1(nyi khri): gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
455a2(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
455a3(nyi khri): ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
455a4(nyi khri): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
455a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
455a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
455a7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam
455b1(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs
455b2(nyi khri): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam
455b3(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
455b4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam
455b5(nyi khri): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
455b6(nyi khri): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams
455b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
456a1(nyi khri): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
456a2(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
456a3(nyi khri): cing gnyis su byar med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
456a4(nyi khri): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
456a5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
456a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
456a7(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
456b1(nyi khri): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
456b2(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
456b3(nyi khri): su byar med do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
456b4(nyi khri): su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
456b5(nyi khri): brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
456b6(nyi khri): do| |'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
456b7(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
457a1(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
457a2(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
457a3(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
457a4(nyi khri): gnyis su byar med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs
457a5(nyi khri): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
457a6(nyi khri): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /lha'i bu dag /don gyi dbang de gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te chos
457a7(nyi khri): bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la khong du chud par dka'
457b1(nyi khri): zhing brtag tu med la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bya ba 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/ da ni
457b2(nyi khri): sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi
457b3(nyi khri): zab pa nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag /nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i
457b4(nyi khri): phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /
457b5(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag /mtha' yas mu med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mi skye mi
457b6(nyi khri): 'gag pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par
457b7(nyi khri): rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir
458a1(nyi khri): chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang
458a2(nyi khri): zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /gzugs zab pa'i
458a3(nyi khri): phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing
458a4(nyi khri): 'brel bar 'byung ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
458a5(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
458a6(nyi khri): zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /dran
458a7(nyi khri): pa nye bar bzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags
458b1(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
458b2(nyi khri): 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
458b3(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so
458b4(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /rnam pa thams
458b5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'i chos
458b6(nyi khri): bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
458b7(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gzung ba'i slad
459a1(nyi khri): du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
459a2(nyi khri): cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
459a3(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs
459a4(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
459a5(nyi khri): gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ chos zab mo 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad
459a6(nyi khri): du ma lags/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams
459a7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzugs so/ /bdag ni gzugs can no//
459b1(nyi khri): bdag ni tshor ba'o/ /bdag gis tshor bar bya'o/ /bdag gi 'du shes so/ /bdag ni 'du shes can no/ /bdag gi 'du byed do/ /bdag gis mngon par 'du bya'o/ /bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /
459b2(nyi khri): bdag gis rnam par shes par bya'o/ /bdag gi skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/ /bdag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos can no/ /bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha
459b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
459b4(nyi khri): su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag
459b5(nyi khri): gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
459b6(nyi khri): bya'o/ /bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la goms
459b7(nyi khri): par bya'o/ /bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro/ /bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o/ /bdag gis
460a1(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
460a2(nyi khri): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
460a3(nyi khri): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
460a4(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi
460a5(nyi khri): 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyad
460a6(nyi khri): par bya'o/ /bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni lan gcig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /
460a7(nyi khri): bdag gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /bdag ni dgra bcom par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rang byang chub bo/ /bdag ni
460b1(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod do/ /bcom ldan
460b2(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag /chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ tshor
460b3(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
460b4(nyi khri): gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gzung
460b5(nyi khri): ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par
460b6(nyi khri): thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma
460b7(nyi khri): yin/ mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po
461a1(nyi khri): dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad
461a2(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /gang yang gzugs gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / tshor
461a3(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
461a4(nyi khri): ba gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gzung
461a5(nyi khri): ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par
461a6(nyi khri): thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa
461a7(nyi khri): dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa
461b1(nyi khri): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i
461b2(nyi khri): phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
461b3(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so/ /nang stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so/ /
461b4(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
461b5(nyi khri): rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par mi nus so/ /rnam pa thams
461b6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni chos
461b7(nyi khri): thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa ste/ chos 'di ni chos gang rnams dang rjes su mthun pa lags she na/ chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /chos
462a1(nyi khri): 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
462a2(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
462a3(nyi khri): dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
462a4(nyi khri): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i
462a5(nyi khri): bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
462a6(nyi khri): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
462a7(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
462b1(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni gang la'ang thogs
462b2(nyi khri): pa ma mchis pa ste/ ci la thogs pa ma mchis she na/ gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis
462b3(nyi khri): so| |skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
462b4(nyi khri): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam
462b5(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /mngon
462b6(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
462b7(nyi khri): par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
463a1(nyi khri): bar la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /chos 'di ni nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid
463a2(nyi khri): dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid
463a3(nyi khri): dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du
463a4(nyi khri): thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /chos 'di ni gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs
463a5(nyi khri): pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub
463a6(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
463a7(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba
463b1(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
463b2(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i
463b3(nyi khri): slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ /chos 'di ni gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / skye
463b4(nyi khri): mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
463b5(nyi khri): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam
463b6(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mngon
463b7(nyi khri): par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang /
464a1(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rten mi dmigs pa'i
464a2(nyi khri): slad du rten ma mchis pa'o/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gnas brtan
464a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni ci dang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing ston
464a4(nyi khri): te/ /mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod
464a5(nyi khri): pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu dag /gang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes
464a6(nyi khri): zer ba ni/ ji ltar rjes su skyes pas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin zhe na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
464a7(nyi khri): bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma 'ongs ma song ba de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma
464b1(nyi khri): song bas na/ thog ma nas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
464b2(nyi khri): kyang de'o/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de'ang de bzhin nyid ma yin no//
464b3(nyi khri): de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas
464b4(nyi khri): pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de
464b5(nyi khri): bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ci la'ang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
464b6(nyi khri): kyang ci la'ang thogs pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig cing gnyis su med de
464b7(nyi khri): gnyis su byar med la de bzhin nyid de'ang ma byas pa ste/ de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa yang med de/ de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa yang
465a1(nyi khri): med pa de'i phyir de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
465a2(nyi khri): rjes su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/ de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor
465a3(nyi khri): gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa/ dbyer med pa/ 'byed pa ma yin
465a4(nyi khri): pa| dmigs su med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa/ dbyer med pa/ 'byed pa ma yin pa/ dmigs su med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas
465a5(nyi khri): brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma
465a6(nyi khri): yin te/ de'ang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin zhing rtag tu de bzhin nyid yin pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor kyang rnam pa gzhan ma yin par de bzhin gshegs
465a7(nyi khri): pa'i rjes su skyes kyang gar yang rjes su skyes pa med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su
465b1(nyi khri): skyes so zhes bya ste/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam
465b2(nyi khri): pa nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de bzhin
465b3(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
465b4(nyi khri): bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid kyis/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de ltar na 'das pa dang / ma
465b5(nyi khri): 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de
465b6(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs
465b7(nyi khri): pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
466a1(nyi khri): bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
466a2(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de
466a3(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de
466a4(nyi khri): bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
466a5(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin
466a6(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
466a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs
466b1(nyi khri): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la
466b2(nyi khri): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid
466b3(nyi khri): kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
466b4(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
466b5(nyi khri): nyid de/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /dran pa nye bar
466b6(nyi khri): bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de
466b7(nyi khri): ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu
467a1(nyi khri): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
467a2(nyi khri): brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin
467a3(nyi khri): nyid de/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /'phags
467a4(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
467a5(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin
467a6(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de
467a7(nyi khri): bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
467b1(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin
467b2(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
467b3(nyi khri): pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid
467b4(nyi khri): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad
467b5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /'di ni/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
467b6(nyi khri): nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur ro/ /de
467b7(nyi khri): bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu g.yos
468a1(nyi khri): so| |'gul to/ /rab tu 'gul to/ /kun tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go /rab tu ldeg go /kun tu ldeg go /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu
468a2(nyi khri): chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /shig shig /rab tu shig shig /kun tu rab tu shig shig go/ shar phyogs mtho na ni nub phyogs dma'/
468a3(nyi khri): shar phyogs dma' na ni nub phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs mtho na ni lho phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs dma' na ni lho phyogs mtho/ dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma'/ dbus dma'
468a4(nyi khri): na ni mtha' mtho bar gyur to/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha rdzas
468a5(nyi khri): kyi tsan+dan gyi phye mas gtor/ mngon par gtor/ rab tu gtor nas/ 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i
468a6(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ngo mtshar to/ /zhes tshig tu brjod do/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi
468a7(nyi khri): rgyud nas bzung ste/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ltar lha'i bu dag /gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes/ gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes
468b1(nyi khri): su ma skyes so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
468b2(nyi khri): shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
468b3(nyi khri): las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rjes su ma skyes/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes
468b4(nyi khri): so| |rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams
468b5(nyi khri): cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med

469a1(nyi khri): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rjes su ma skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi
469a2(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
469a3(nyi khri): pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi
469a4(nyi khri): rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma
469a5(nyi khri): skyes so/ /'dus byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid

469a7(nyi khri): skyes/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang rjes su skyes pa dang / gang gis rjes su skyes pa dang / gang
469b1(nyi khri): rjes su bskyed pa dang / gang gis rjes su bskyed pa dang / gang rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'am/ gang gis rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs
469b2(nyi khri): so| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
469b3(nyi khri): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni zab pa ste/ de la gzugs mi
469b4(nyi khri): dmigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba dang / 'du
469b5(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes
469b6(nyi khri): pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid
469b7(nyi khri): mi dmigs te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa
470a1(nyi khri): thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam
470a2(nyi khri): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /

470a5(nyi khri): 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs
470a6(nyi khri): par ga la 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
470a7(nyi khri): kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
470b1(nyi khri): de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab pa ste/ de la gzugs mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs

470b5(nyi khri): ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs/
470b6(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs
470b7(nyi khri): par ga la 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
471a1(nyi khri): pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin
471a2(nyi khri): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong nyis brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong ma lnga brgya
471a3(nyi khri): ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo//
471a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' yongs su nyams pa'i chos can drug cu ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
471a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po de dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya bsnyen bkur te thams cad du'ang sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam
471a6(nyi khri): gtan bsgrubs/ shes rab bsgoms kyang / de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bas/ sbyin pa byin no/ /
471a7(nyi khri): 'di ni sbyin pa'o/ /'di la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ni tshul khrims so/ /bdag gis ni bsrung bar bya'o/ /'di ni bzod pa'o/ /bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o/ /'di ni
471b1(nyi khri): brtson 'grus so/ /bdag gis ni brtsam par bya'o/ /'di ni bsam gtan no/ /bdag gis ni mnyam par gzhag par bya'o/ /'di ni shes rab bo/ /bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o//
471b2(nyi khri): zhes tha dad par spyod pas de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bar sbyin pa gtong / tshul khrims bsrung / bzod pa bsgom/
471b3(nyi khri): brtson 'grus brtsam/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog /shes rab la goms par byed cing / de dag 'du shes sna tshogs kyis spyod pas tha mi dad pas mi dmigs pa'i
471b4(nyi khri): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs so/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi
471b5(nyi khri): bar du thob bo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma med pa'am smon pa med pa yod mod kyi/ de
471b6(nyi khri): dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su
471b7(nyi khri): 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgom du 'dra'ang
472a1(nyi khri): s hes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyis shing nyan thos
472a2(nyi khri): dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dag ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma
472a3(nyi khri): mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgom du bas kyang / thabs mkhas pa la brten cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
472a4(nyi khri): rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral ba/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
472a5(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos 'ba' zhig bsgom pa ni thabs mkhas pa ma thob pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la
472a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba rnams ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
472a7(nyi khri): pa'i chos rnams la bsgom zhing thabs mkhas pa thob pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
472b1(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bya zhig la lus dpag tshad brgya pa'am/ dpag tshad nyis brgya pa'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa'am/ dpag
472b2(nyi khri): tshad bzhi brgya pa'am/ dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig yod la/ de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas 'dir 'ong bar 'dod la/ bya de la'ang 'dab ma med pa zhig ste/ de 'dzam
472b3(nyi khri): bu'i gling gnas so snyam nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas bdag nyid mchongs te/ gal te bya de sa lam nas ga re bdag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su
472b4(nyi khri): gnas par bya'o snyam du bsams na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la ji snyam du sems/ bya des phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
472b5(nyi khri): 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te lam nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag gis ci nas kyang ma smad ma snad par 'dzam bu'i gling du
472b6(nyi khri): 'dug par bya'o snyam na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la ji snyam du sems/ bya de 'dzam bu'i gling du ma smas ma snad par 'dug par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
472b7(nyi khri): ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'dzam bu'i gling du lhung nas smas pa'am snad par yang 'gyur/ 'gum pa'am/ gum la thug par sdug bsngal bar yang 'gyur
473a1(nyi khri): ro| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar lus che la 'dab ma ma mchis pa de ni de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
473a2(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa gtong zhing / tshul khrims bsrung /
473a3(nyi khri): bzod pa bsgom/ brtson 'grus brtsom/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
473a4(nyi khri): bar bya ba'i phyir de'i smon pa'ang che/ de'i sems bskyed pa'ang che/ yongs su 'dzin pa'ang tshad med du zin kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs
473a5(nyi khri): mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des rnam pa thams
473a6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi ldan par sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bsgrubs pas/ byang
473a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo //
473b1(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang rnam
473b2(nyi khri): par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa sems shing 'dzin la mtshan mar byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims mi shes/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes
473b3(nyi khri): rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mi shes na/ de mi shes/ khong du ma chud pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra thos
473b4(nyi khri): nas de ni de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te/ de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar bzung zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de ltar yongs su
473b5(nyi khri): bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
473b6(nyi khri): dang / thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ni de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi za'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
473b7(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bar sbyin pa gtong zhing tshul khrims
474a1(nyi khri): bsrung ba dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs
474a2(nyi khri): mkhas pa dang ma bral ba ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
474a3(nyi khri): rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de la mtshan mar mi byed de/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge
474a4(nyi khri): 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos dang /
474a5(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des thog ma sems bskyed pa/
474a6(nyi khri): nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung / tshul khrims bsrungs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / bzod pa bsgrubs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / brtson 'grus
474a7(nyi khri): brtsams kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa
474b1(nyi khri): dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs
474b2(nyi khri): pa mtshan mar ma bzung / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mtshan ma dang
474b3(nyi khri): bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa
474b4(nyi khri): dang / shes rab sgom pa dang / nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom pa dang / yang dag
474b5(nyi khri): par spong pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden

474b7(nyi khri): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i

475a2(nyi khri): kyi bar du sgom pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam
475a3(nyi khri): po lnga bcu pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
475a4(nyi khri): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral na/ de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
475a5(nyi khri): chub ni the tshom ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar
475a6(nyi khri): bzung ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i gzungs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam

481b2(nyi khri): pa| tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

481b4(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
